loans.name: Jovita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHUARA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco. 
La socia es la Sra. Jovita continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua vendiendo  productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos entre otros productos , siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, aceite entre otros.
texts.en:
This group member belongs to the community bank "San Isidro de Yanahuara", located in the district of Urubamba, part of the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco.

The group member is Jovita and she continues to work in her grocery store. She's grateful for the loan and pledges to make the payments. The group member still sells basic household products such as rice, sugar, noodles, and more. This is the way that she gets her family ahead. She's applying for this loan so that she can purchase products such as rice, oil, and more.

loans.use: To purchase products such as rice and oil, among other things.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHUARA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de  Yanahuara, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco. 
La socia es la Sra. Josefina; la socia continua con su negocio de crianza de animales, la socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua con su  negocio de crianza de animales, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua  criando los animales como pollos y cuyes y luego los hace engordar y luego los vende en forma ambulatoria, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante  su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes entre otros.
texts.en:
This group member belongs to the community bank "San Isidro de Yanahuara", a bank located in the district of Yanahuara, part of the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco. 
The group member is Josefina; she continues to work in her animal raising business. She's happy because of the loan and pledges to make the payments. She's still working in her animal raising business, and is a responsible and hardworking person. She continues to raise animals such as chicks and guinea pigs and then fattens them to sell them as a street vendor. This is the way that she gets her family ahead. 
This group member is applying for the loan to purchase guinea pigs and more.

loans.use: To purchase guinea pigs, and more.

loans.name: Salud Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SALUD”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. 

La socia es la Sra. Nancy Nicanora ella es soltera y tiene 61 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de tejidos , la socia vende diferentes tejidos,la socia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que por medio de este negocio saca adelante a susn hijos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de tejidos . La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tejidos . 

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de artesania, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de productos de belleza. 

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "Salud" ["Health"] communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is part of Cusco Province in the department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Nancy Nicanora. She is single and 61 years old. She has two children. She works in her business selling knitted/woven items. 

Nancy sells different knitted/woven items. She is a hardworking and enterprising woman who provides for her children through this business. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. She has already had this business for eight years and it is going very well for her. 

Nancy's dream is to expand her business selling knitted/woven items. She is requesting the loan to buy knitted/woven items.

The other members earn their livings selling clothing, handicrafts, groceries, and beauty products. 

Nancy is grateful to those who are part of her dream through this medium, and she promises to make her loan payments according to the established timetable.

loans.use: to buy knitted/woven items

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel, está satisfechos por las cosechas de granos básicos tan abundantes que ha tenido, con la ayuda de los insumos agrícolas que se compró con el crédito anterior, su familia se mantiene y las condiciones económicas están cambiando positivamente, dice que hasta la fecha no ha tenido dificultades para mantenerse trabajando.
En busca de tener siempre su negocio en el mercado, solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar insecticidas, abono y semilla, tendrá a su disposición los materiales que le ayudan a tener mejores cosechas, espera que el clima sea favorable para tener buenos resultados.
texts.en:
Miguel is satisfied with abundant harvests of basic grains that he has had. With the help of the agricultural supplies he bought with his last loan, his family has been provided for and their economic conditions are changing for the better. He says that to this day he has not had any difficulty keeping work. 

In order to always have his business at the market, Miguel is requesting a new loan to buy insecticides, fertilizer, and seeds, materials which will help him have a better harvest. He hopes the weather is favorable so that he has good results.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, fertilizer, and seeds, materials which will help him have a better harvest.

loans.name: Ibtisam

texts.en:
Ibtisam is a 29-year-old married lady who lives in Dair Alla. She is the mother of three kids. Ibtisam could not complete her education because she got married but that did not stop her from trying to be a productive woman in her family and her community.

Her husband works in the army with little salary, so she decided to create a small business selling food supplies in her home. After she saved some money, she opened an independent small grocery near her home. Because she wants to help provide more of a decent life for her family, Ibtisam wants to expand her work and develop it. Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy more products and items to sell and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy more products and items to sell and increase her income.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en: Nasreen is a 41-year-old hardworking woman with four children. She has been providing the service of stitching clothes in her locality. She is quite popular for her skills in stitching. Nasreen’s work brought the family out of a financial crisis that they were facing when she started working. Over the years, she has established a good clientele. Nasreen has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. She intends to use this loan to purchase a new stitching machine with some spools of thread and laces to consistently meet the demands of her customers. She aspires to save money for their prosperous future.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine with some spools of thread and laces to consistently meet the demands of her customers.

loans.name: Karim

texts.en:
Karim is a 25-year-old single man who recently started working at a company to cover his needs and expenses. He is also still studying at the university, for he believes that education is the only way to achieve his dreams and live in good conditions.

Karim is an ambitious man and hard worker who is acquiring a loan today to pay his university tuition fees. He hopes to finish his studies and get a promotion in his work, and maybe later on he will open his own business. He aims to increase his income and build a better future for himself.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition fees

loans.name: Pamba Group

texts.en:
Sija is in her early 50s and is a widow with two grownup children.  She has been running a general store for six years now.  She works from 6 a.m. to 9 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.  

This will be Sija's fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to continue increasing the shop stock and has paid back all her loans successfully. She used the profit to take care of herself, repay the loan and cover household expenses.  She will use this loan to increase the shop inventory and serve more people.  She dreams of having her shop be big.

Sija will share this loan with her loan group Pamba which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase the shop inventory and serve more people.

loans.name: Karin

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHUARA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco. 
La socia es la Sra. Karin; La socia continua con su negocio de cafetería, la socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua vendiendo  lo que son galletas, hamburguesas entre otros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar tortas, galletas, gaseosas entre otros.
texts.en:
This group member belongs to the community bank "San Isidro de Yanahuara", a bank located in the district of Urubamba, part of the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco. The group member is Karin, who continues to work in her cafeteria business. She's happy about the loan and pledges to make the payments. This member of the group is still selling cookies, hamburgers, and more. She's a responsible and hardworking person, and this is how she gets her family ahead.
This group member is applying for a loan to purchase pastries, cookies, soft drinks and more.

loans.use: To purchase pastries, cookies, soft drinks and more.

loans.name: Las Moriposas De Mayorazgo Group

texts.es:
Las Mariposas de Mayorazgo es un grupo cuyo nombre eligieron sus integrantes debido a su pasión por los insectos. La comunidad de donde son originarias es realmente muy tranquila, aún se aprecian sus raíces mazahuas ya que se escuchan conversaciones en la lengua materna, además de que aún se observan los coloridos trajes típicos. La mayor parte de la población se dedica al cultivo de maíz y cría de animales como pollos, pavs, cerdos, conejos, borregos, becerros, etc.
   Doña Catalina es conocida por ser una mujer muy dedicada, en su comunidad le dicen de cariño doña Cata. Está casada con el señor José Félix quien trabaja en el campo, tienen cuarenta años juntos y han formado una familia con 11 hijos quienes ahora son independientes.
   Desde muy pequeña, Cata veía como sus padres se dedicaban al cuidado de becerros; los compraban desde muy pequeños y con los ingresos obtenidos podían solventar fácilmente los gastos de su hogar.  “Hace 30 años mi papá me regaló un becerro pequeño, cría de una de sus vacas” y así fue que Cata también inició con su propia actividad. Doña Cata pretende emplear el préstamo que VisionFund le ofrece para comprar tres becerros medianos y alimento suficiente para venderlos lo antes posible. Por lo general conserva los animales solamente medio año hasta que los animales están listos para vender. 
   Cata quiere continuar con su negocio porque es realmente bueno y una de sus metas es verlo crecer, con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda y su calidad de vida. “Muchas veces mi esposo trabaja en el campo pero ya es muy mal pagado y nuestros animales nos ayudan a salir adelante” comento Doña Cata.
   Las integrantes del grupo son Anayeli, Remedios y Rosio quienes también invertirán en la cría y engorda de becerros.
*La fotografía fue tomada en las escaleras del kiosco, Doña Cata es quien viste el suéter blanco*
texts.en:
"Las Mariposas de Mayorazgo" is a group whose name was chosen by its members because of their passion for butterflies. The community they come from is actually very quiet. Their Mazahua roots are still valued, given that conversations are heard in the mother tongue. Additionally, the colorful traditional clothing is still worn. Most of the locals grow corn and raise animals such as chickens, turkeys, pigs, rabbits, sheep, calves, etc.

Catalina is known for being a very dedicated woman. People in her community call her "darling Cata". She is married to José Félix, who works in the field. They have been together for 40 years and have 11 children who are now independent.

Since she was little, Cata watched as her parents cared for calves; they bought them when the calves were very young. They could easily cover their household expenses with the income earned. Cata says, "Thirty years ago, my father gave me a small calf, bred from one of his cows", and so Cata began her own business. 

Cata intends to use the loan provided by VisionFund to buy three medium-sized calves and enough feed to sell them as soon as possible. She generally only keeps animals half a year until they are ready to sell.
 
Cata wants to continue her business because it's very good, and one of her goals is to see it grow in order to improve her home and her quality of life. "My husband works in the field often, but he is very poorly paid, and our animals help us get ahead," Cata says.

The other members of the group are Anayeli, Remedios and Rosio, who will also invest in breeding and fattening calves.

*The photograph was taken on the steps of the pavilion. Cata is the one wearing the white sweater.*

loans.use: to buy three calves and feed.

loans.name: Nelfa

texts.en:
Nelfa is a woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Nelfa is 25 years old now.

Nelfa has a fish vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5000 loan amount through NWTF to buy boxes of fish to sell.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Nelfa has been in this business for 7 years. In the future, Nelfa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Tadeo

texts.en: Tadeo used the previous loan to add stock of cooking oil, sugar, salt and soap. He is a retailer and at the same time offers a service of phone charging. He faces hardships of little capital to buy and increase stock, hence limited profits. Besides that, he has a vision of having enough stock and educating his children to higher levels of learning. Tadeo has asked for a loan to buy drinks and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy drinks and soap to sell.

loans.name: Adrine

texts.en: Adrine is a widowed lady with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She has a business of distilling waragi and she also does farming. She faces challenges of little capital that hinder expansion of her business. She has asked for a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children

loans.name: José Baudilio

texts.es:
Don José  a pesar de su avanzada edad  logro cancelar su  préstamo sin ninguna dificultad y gracias al crédito el logro comprar sus materiales para seguir elaborando los mejores muebles de su comunidad, pero José nuevamente solicita un préstamo para poder  comprar algunas herramientas porque los clientes le piden elaborar muebles modernos y él no cuenta con las herramientas necesarias por tal razón solicita un préstamo.
El gran sueño de Don José es contar con una carpintería equipada para satisfacer mejor las necesidades de sus clientes.
texts.en: In spite of his advanced age Jose managed to pay off his loan with no trouble and thanks to the loan was able to purchase materials to continue making the best furniture in the community. However Jose is again applying for a loan to be able to buy some tools because his customers are asking him to make modern furniture and he doesn't have the necessary tools, and it's for this reason that he's applying for the loan. Jose's big dream is to have a well-equipped carpentry workshop where he can better serve his customers' needs.

loans.use: To purchase carpentry tools.

loans.name: Musrat

texts.en:
Musrat  is a 52-year-old married woman. Her husband is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now the rickshaw requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Musrat  has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires along with auto spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him provide better transport service to his passengers. 

Musrat  is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires along with auto spare parts for her husband's vehicle

loans.name: Wiliiam

texts.es: William, tiene la edad  de 64 años, está casado, vive con su esposa  que es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de otra en trabajos de preparación del terreno. Además de poder comprar unas plantas de banano de buena calidad y sanidad para que tengan un buen desarrollo a corto plazo, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de banano. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
William is 64 years old, and he is married. He lives with his wife, who is his highest priority. 

With his loan, he expects to purchase fertilizer and fungicide, and to pay for labor for the work of preparing the land. He will also be able to purchase good quality, healthy banana plants, so that they can develop well in a short time, and make the most of the good soil fertility and climate, and other conditions that favor the cultivation of bananas. 

With these improvements to the crop, he hopes to make a little profit and thus improve his family’s living conditions, in addition to investing a little more in the area under cultivation and accomplishing some goals. 

This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had loans before with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has made it very easy for him to get the loan, and the interest rate is much lower.

loans.use: to plant bananas.

loans.name: Moussa

texts.en:
Moussa is a 37-year-old single Palestinian refugee, who has been working since 2004 in car's body repairs and it's his only source of income for living. Moussa is the sole breadwinner for three members of his family, and he has to work hard to provide them with the necessary living needs.

Since Moussa is planning to make his own small family, and because his business income barely covers his family's increasing living needs, he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to buy his requested home furniture since he is preparing himself to get married soon. He hopes that in the future his business will develop properly and he can improve his family's living more.

loans.use: To buy his requested home furniture since he is preparing himself to get married soon

loans.name: Perviz

texts.en:
Perviz is a 27-year-old married man from the Agcabadi region. He lives with his wife and two children in a simple humble house. He works as a worker in a construction company where he earns a low income. This is the only source of income for the family. 

His second son was born with a disability, and the other one contracted a flu. They are on bed rest. Perviz is trying to make sure that his children recover soon. It is very difficult for him now because he has to purchase expensive medications, but does not have enough money, so he decided to request a loan. He  has no one to turn to. He relies on your support.

loans.use: to purchase expensive medications

loans.name: Wissam

texts.en:
Wissam is a 43-year-old Palestinian Refugee, and a married father of two children who are enrolled in a private school to obtain the best education he can provide them.

Wissam is employed in a dairy products factory since August 2014, but his limited monthly salary is barely enough to cover his family's increasing living needs. Thus for this reason, he is requesting a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to start his own business by opening his own grocery store in his region as a first step forward towards improving his family's lives.

loans.use: to open his own grocery store in his region

loans.name: Zeenat

texts.en: Zeenat is a 45-year-old married woman and a mother of three children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all the household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good-quality milk in her locality. With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business. Currently she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and earn profits for providing her family with the basic necessities of life.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and earn profits for providing her family with the basic necessities of life.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! This is Ali, one of Ruma’s agents. Ali lives in South Bogor, an area in West Java, located about an hour and thirty minutes drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. Ali is happily married. Ali sells mobile airtime credits for his community. He joined Ruma almost a year ago. He knew Ruma from Ruma’s sales executive that came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he had heard that Ruma has the best service and system. Ali is a hardworking person and his community sees him as a trusted and informative mobile provider. 

As the business grows, Ali is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to his community. Your loan will be very useful to help Ali improve his business and accordingly, his community which needs access to such services.  

Ali's goal in the near future is to serve as an e-commerce service provider for his community with Ruma's latest products called Mapan. 

As seen in the photo, Ali is sitting. He thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases for members of his local community.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago, de 65 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería, vive junto a su esposa y una hija, su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar. 
 
Santiago, se ha dedicado a la agricultura y la ganadería desde hace varios años, esto lo aprendió de su padre quien le enseño a cultivar la tierra y a la crianza de ganado; el ganado lo tiene en su casa y se traslada como 1 kilómetro para llevarlo hasta el potrero y además ahí es donde cultiva la tierra. 

El préstamo está solicitando será utilizado para comprar fertilizantes para el cultivo de granos básicos, ya que la tierra está sembrada y necesita el primer riego de abono.
 
Santiago, sueña con ver crecer a sus nietos y que al igual que sus hijos sean personas de bien para la sociedad.
texts.en:
Santiago is 65 years old and works in agriculture and ranching. He lives with his wife, who works in the home, and his daughter. He has been working in agriculture and ranching for several years. He learned it from his father, who taught him to cultivate the land and to raise cattle. The cattle live at his house, and must travel about 1 kilometer to the pasture, which is also where Santiago grows his crops.

Santiago is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer for the cultivation of basic grains, since the seeds are already planted and he needs to irrigate the first layer of fertilizer.

Santiago dreams of seeing his grandchildren grow up, and equally of seeing his children become people who do good for society.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the cultivation of basic grains.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for topdressing his crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy dairy feeds for her dairy cows, fertilizer and seeds for planting on her farm. She hopes this will enable her to get more milk and farm produce to sell.

loans.name: Sevinc

texts.en:
Sevinc is a 38-year-old widow and mother of two children. She is trying to raise her children without feeling the absence of their father too much. When she was 13, she started to learn to work in agriculture. Her parents were the ones who taught her to grow fruits and vegetables, since it was their only source of income. She has been growing vegetables and fruits for more than 3 years now. She sells her crops in the central bazaar to make profits in order to support her family.  Sevinc’s income from her business is 150 AZN. 

In order to improve the living conditions of her family, she plans to expand her business. This requires a lot of dedication and effort. Since the vegetable and fruits business is profitable and a fun business, she wants the business to continue and prosper.

Sevinc needs a 1,500 AZN loan to buy fertilizers, seeds, and fruit trees. Her biggest wish is to offer her children an education so that they can have good careers and help their family. This is her 1st loan.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, and fruit trees

loans.name: Lasha

texts.en:
Lasha, a 29 year-old married man, lives in Samtredia district. He has a secondary education; that is the additional reason for his unemployment. Also there is a high-unemployment rate in the region. He has a wife and a mother who is a nurse and gets the only income for their family's well being. Lasha's wife gets also temporary transfers from her mother. 

Lasha wants to make better living conditions on his own and start his activity. It was hard for Lasha to get the loan as he has no business experience. After several unsuccessful attempts, he applied for a loan from MFO Credo. His request was approved in the framework of the Start-Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva, permitting the poor and inexperienced people to start or restart businesses. 

Lasha plans to purchase a secondhand car and start working as a taxi driver and transfer people towards the capital. Lasha looks forward to Kiva lenders' help and will be very grateful to them for giving him a chance to earn his own income and tackle the financial difficulties.

loans.use: To purchase a car and start working as a taxi driver

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics and hair braids for her salon business.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es:
Domingo gracias al crédito anterior logro comprar el terreno que el en ese momento necesitaba y también pudo realizar algunas mejoras de su casa, el ahora nuevamente se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar materiales como cemento, block y arena para construir un cuarto porque es una de las necesidades primordiales que su familia tiene.
Domingo tiene el anhelo de conseguir el crédito para seguir mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Domingo, thanks to the previous loan, was able to buy the land that he needed at that time and also was able to make various improvements in his home.  He now again sees the need to apply for a loan to buy materials like cement, blocks, and sand to build a room because this is one of the primary needs of his family.

Domingo wants to obtain the loan to continue improving the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as cement, blocks, and sand.

loans.name: Nyakasanga School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Lamulat. She is the head teacher of Nyakasanga Infant School, a mixed school in the rural area of Nyakasanga in Kasese with 300 students. Nyakasanga School has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water-filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. Installing a water-filtration system will therefore save the school money in the long term as the cost of firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the school to purchase a UV water-treatment system with a 450 litre tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day. 

Nyakasanga School will repay their loan from their school fees, which they collect each term. Lamulat ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve her students’ concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from waterborne diseases as well as increase the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: To purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks of farm produce for sale to earn more income.

loans.name: Henny

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! This is Henny, one of Ruma’s agents. Henny lives in South Bogor, an area in West Java located about an hour and thirty minutes drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. She is happily married. Together with her husband, they have two daughters. Henny sells mobile airtime credits to her community. She joined Ruma almost a year ago. She knew about Ruma from Ruma’s sales executive that came to her house. She decided to join Ruma because she wants to help her husband increase their income, as well as contribute to her community. Henny is a hardworking person. Her community sees her as a kind and cheerful mobile provider. 

As the business grows, Henny is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to her community. Your loan will be very useful to help Henny improve her business and accordingly her community who needs access to such services, so her community can have access to their loved ones, no matter how far apart they are. 

Henny's goal in the near future is to serve as an e-commerce business in her community with Ruma's latest product called Mapan. 

As seen in the photo, Henny is sitting. 

She thanks you for your kind and endless support.

loans.use: to purchase additional prepaid airtime credit for helping community members who need access to connect with their loved ones

loans.name: Francisco Reynaldo

texts.es:
Reynaldo, de 26 años de edad, es un joven emprendedor y trabajador, se dedica a la agricultura, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañado y vive junto a su pareja y su hijo pequeño. 

Reynaldo, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos desde que tenía 8 años, comenzó ayudándole a su papá, quien fue quien le enseño a cultivar, este tipo de trabajo lo realiza 2 veces al año y cuando no está cultivando propio, trabaja para otras personas.  
  
El préstamo será utilizado para comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizantes y pesticidas, él quiere prepararse con tiempo, para que cuando empiecen las lluvias, todo esté listo para empezar a sembrar. 
 
Reynaldo, sueña con que su familia tenga buena salud y que sus hijos sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Reynaldo is a 26 year old entrepreneur and worker. He works in agriculture. He studied until sixth grade. He lives with his partner and a young son.

Reynaldo makes living cultivating basic grains since he was 8 years old when he began helping his father who taught him the trade. He works on it twice a year. When he is not cultivating, he works for others.

The loan will be used to buy corn seed, fertilizers and pesticides. He wants to be prepared ahead of time so that when the rain starts, everything will be ready to start planting.

Reynaldo hopes that his family is in good health and that his children will be good people.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer to increase nutrients in the soil for better harvest and to meet client needs and those of her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more inventory of clothing for sale

loans.name: Milka

texts.en:
Milka is 65 years old, married, and blessed with 4 children. She is a farmer and has been growing cash crops for sale. She will use the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm, and hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her future hopes are to improve her farming, make more income, and support her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more inventory of clothes to sell in the market

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 41 years old, married to Naomy, and he supports 9 family members.
 
He has been a farmer for the last 15 years, and the business earns him an income of 11,000 KES per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from Vision Fund Kenya to purchase farm tools such as jembes and farm inputs such as fertilizer for his farming activity which will increase his farming produce to meet client needs.

He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate his children. 

His hope is to be financially stable and expand his business sector.

loans.use: to purchase farm tools such as jembes and farm inputs such as fertilizer for his farming activity

loans.name: Reinerio

texts.es:
Reinerio vive junto a su cónyuge en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pimpingos, ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. Su población se dedica principalmente al comercio de ganado vacuno, cultivo de café y frutales.

El se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de café de variedad catimore, cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Su esposa le apoya en esta labor preparando los alimentos para los jornaleros que realizan las actividades que requiere el cultivo de café. Ha solicitado un préstamo para dar mantenimiento a su cultivo de café mediante las deshierbas, abonamiento y control fitosanitario para obtener una producción de calidad y de esta manera venderlo a un buen precio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Reinerio lives with his partner in their own house made of rustic materials in the district of Pimpingos, located in the Cutervo province and Cajamarca region in the northern mountain range of Peru. Its population is primarily dedicated to trade in cattle and growing coffee and fruit.

He makes a living in agriculture, especially growing coffee of the catimor variety. He has more than three years of experience in this business and very good personal and work references in the area. His wife helps him with this work, preparing food for the day laborers who do the work that coffee requires. 

He has asked for a loan to do maintenance on his coffee with weeding, fertilizer and phytosanitary control in order to obtain a good-quality production. He will thus be able to sell it to his customers at a good price, which will allow him to increase his income level and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to do maintenance on his coffee crop with weeding, fertilizer and phytosanitary control

loans.name: Silver

texts.en:
Silver is 40 years old, married to Kennedy and supports a family of four members. She has been in the business of selling fruits and vegetables for the last five years earning KES 9,000 per month. 

Silver has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to put up a stable stall and add more stock to satisfy her customers' needs. She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children. Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: To put up a stable stall and add more stock to satisfy her customers' needs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for increased milk production

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen de 49 años de edad, estudió hasta 5to grado de nivel básico, actualmente está acompañado y su pareja realiza labores domésticas en su vivienda; tienen 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando y ayudan a Carmen en las labores agropecuarias como cultivo de granos básicos y crianza de animales.


Carmen se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino y al cultivo de granos básicos como maíz y frijol, actividades que realiza desde hace muchos años, el cual aprendió de su padre, ya que desde muy pequeño ayudaba en dichas labores junto a sus hermanos.- Carmen tiene que recorrer una distancia corta para llegar hasta el lugar donde tiene sus animales y cultivos.


Carmen utilizará el presente crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abonos, pago de jornales y preparación de terreno para dicho cultivo, con el cual espera tener una buena cosecha este año.

Lo que él más sueña es tener  una vivienda digna, cómoda y segura para su familia, además darles una buena educación a sus hijos y todo esto lo espera lograr con mucho sacrificio y  esfuerzos en su trabajo y por medio de su cultivo cada año.
texts.en:
Carmen is 49-years old.  He went to school until 5th grade.  He is currently married, and his wife takes care of the household chores.  They have three children who go to school and help Carmen with the farm work, which is growing staple grains and raising animals. 

Carmen makes his living raising bovine livestock and growing staple grains, such as corn and beans.  These are things he has been doing for many yeas and which he learned from his father.  Carmen and his siblings helped with this kind of work since he was very young.  Carmen only travels a short distance to reach the area where he has his livestock and crops. 

Carmen will use the current loan to purchase agricultural supplies, such as fertilizers and compost, to pay day laborers and to prepare his land for planting his crops.  Carmen hopes that all his gives him a good harvest this year. 

What Carmen hopes for most is to have a dignified, comfortable and safe home for his family.  In addition, he wants to give his children a good education.  He expects to achieve all this through a lot of sacrifice and hard work in his labors and through each year's harvest.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies, such as fertilizers and compost, to pay day laborers and to prepare his fields for planting.

loans.name: Mujeres De Camanchaj Los Olivos Group

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 53 años de edad, es casada tiene una hermosa familia de seis hijos de las edades entre 29 y 14 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Chichicastenango.
Ana (es la señora que se ubica en medio de la fotografía de blusa color limón)  con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa se dedica a la elaboración de ropa típica, esta labor lo realiza ella desde hace quince años. Pero para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica a la venta de helados de frutas.
Ana gracias al empeño que le dedica  a su trabajo ella tiene muchos clientes es por eso que ahora  junto a un grupo de personas solicita un préstamo  para poder comprar más cortes y luego venderlas a un buen precio a sus clientes.
Ana sueña con poder instalar  un local donde pueda exhibir mejor su  mercadería  y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Ana is 53 years old and married. She has a beautiful family of six children between the ages of 29 and 14. This humble family lives in a community in Chichicastenango. 

Ana (the lady in the middle of the photograph in the lime colored blouse) makes traditional clothing, in an effort to earn an income and help her husband with the household expenses. She has been doing this work for 15 years, but she also sells frozen fruit treats in order to improve her income.

Thanks to the effort that she devotes to her work, Ana has many customers. That is why, along with a group of people, she wants to request a loan in order to be able to purchase more skirts and sell them to her customers at a good price later. 

Ana dreams of being able to set up a shop where she could better display her merchandise and improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase and sell traditional skirts.

loans.name: Severina

texts.es: La señora Severina con 49 años de edad tiene dos dependientes económicos, es una persona trabajadora, humilde y responsable, de escasos recursos económicos, cuenta con una actividad de producción agrícola, con ingresos económicos por la venta estacional de papa y papaliza en la misma comunidad donde vive con rotación de cultivos, de esta forma ella sola mantiene a sus hijos económicamente ya que su esposo le abandono hace 3 años atrás dejándola con sus dos hijos; ella necesita un crédito para compra de insumos agrícolas, abono orgánico (gallinaza), semilla de papa y productos agroquímicos con esto mejorara sus ingresos haciendo cultivar en más superficies para así poder vivir más cómodamente con su familia.
texts.en:
Severina is 49 years old and has two dependents. She is hardworking, humble and responsible. From limited economic resources, she works in agricultural production. She earns income from seasonal sales of potatoes and ullucos in the same community where she lives with crop rotation. Currently she barely manages to support her children since her husband abandoned her three years ago, leaving her with two children. 

She needs a loan to purchase agricultural inputs, organic fertilizer (manure), potato seed and agrochemicals. This will improve her incomes by cultivating more surfaces so that she can live more comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs, organic fertilizer (manure), potato seed and agrochemicals to improve her income

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a car, so that she can work offering a taxi service and therefore achieve improving the quality of life of her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and farm tools for farming

loans.name: Tanbizinse Group

texts.fr:
Mme ADAMA est responsable du groupe TANBIZINSE. Mariée, elle est mère de 06enfants. Le plus âgé a 20ans et le moins âgé a 06ans. 05vont à l’école.
Mme fait la jardinage depuis 03ans. Elle s’approvisionne  dans son village chez les marchands ambulant.
Elle veut s’acheter 03sac d'engrais, 05kg de semences et 06boites de pesticide.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut renforcer son activité. Mme ambitionne améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Ms. ADAMA is the official of the group TANBIZINSE. A married woman, she is the mother of six children. The oldest is 20 years old, and the youngest is 6. Five go to school. Ms. ADAMA has been growing vegetables for three years. She gets her supplies from the itinerant merchants in her village. She wants to purchase 3 sacks of fertilizer, 5 kg of seeds, and 6 cans of pesticide. With the profits, she wants to bolster her business. Her ambition is to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase 3 sacks of fertilizer, 5 kg of seeds, and 6 cans of pesticide

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy better machines for use in the call center transactions for better services

loans.name: Yessica Yamileh

texts.es:
Yéssica de 31 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja de albañil, tienen dos hijos menores de edad y viven en familia en casa propia.

Yéssica es empleada en una oficina, desde que salió de estudiar comenzó a trabajar y lo hace en un horario de 7:30 AM a 4:30 PM.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar puertas y ventanas para su casa, de esa manera logrará que su hijo y pareja vivan en mejores condiciones de vida

Ella sueña con seguir trabajando para darle lo mejor a sus hijos y lograr todas sus metas.
texts.en:
Yéssica, 31 years old, studied until high school. She is partnered and her partner works as a bricklayer. They have two underage children, and live as a family in their own house.

Yéssica is an employee in an office, since she finished studying she started to work and she does it on a schedule of 7:30 AM to 4:30 PM.

She needs the loan to buy doors and windows for her house. In this manner, she will achieve that her children and partner live in better living conditions. She dreams of continuing working to give the best to her children and achieve all of her goals.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies, such as fertilizers and compost, and to pay for preparing his land and labor.

loans.name: José Leonel

texts.es:
José de 26 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado del nivel básico, no pudo seguir estudiando debido a la falta de recursos económicos de su familia, se crió con su mamá y sus tres hermanos pues su papá murió cuando era niño.

José trabaja como agricultor, aprendió gracias a las enseñanzas de sus abuelos desde que tenía once años de edad, también ahora en día trabaja de electricista oficio que aprendió gracias a un curso de electricista que duro durante tres meses en la comunidad. 

Él solicita este financiamiento para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono y fertilizantes para la siembra de una hectárea de maíz, también pagará el alquiler del terreno donde realiza los trabajos. 

José sueña con tener su propio terreno para cultivar pues siempre tiene que estar alquilando.
texts.en:
José, 26 years old, studied until fourth grade of the basic level; he couldn't continue studying due to a lack of economic resources of his family. He was raised with his mother and his three siblings, well, his father died when he was a child.

José worked as a farmer; he learned thanks to the teachings of his grandparents since he was eleven years old. Now he also works as an electrician by day, a trade he learned thanks to an electrician course that lasted three months in the community.

He is applying for this loan to buy agricultural supplies like manure and fertilizers for sowing a hectare of corn, he will also pay the rent of the land where he does his work.

José dreams of having his own land to cultivate, well, he always has to be renting.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like manure and fertilizers for sowing a hectare of corn.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Sétou est la femme  qui tient la corne du  bélier.
C’est une brave  Malienne vivant dans le milieu rural avec sa famille, elle est âgée de 44 ans. Elle est mariée mais  elle n’a pas eu la chance d’aller à l’école.
Elle est mère d’un enfant âgé de 18 ans qui est scolarisé. Son mari fait l’agriculture et l’élevage pour gagner sa vie.
Sétou fait l’embouche ovine depuis 10 ans. Elle s’approvisionne toujours dans les marchés locaux et revend dans les mêmes marchés locaux  après l’engraissement. Elle fait recourt aux services financiers de l’IMF (RMCR) pour soutenir son activité d’embouche ovine à travers l’achat de béliers maigres, aliment bétail, son du mil, des médicaments.
Le fond qu’elle reçoit du RMCR est investi dans son activité d’embouche ovine. 
Cette activité est une passion  parce qu’elle  arrive à subvenir à ses petits besoins ainsi que ceux de son enfant (habillement, nourriture, santé, éducation). Son bénéfice prévisionnel mensuel est de 5000FCFA. Le prêt l’aidera à augmenter ses revenus. 
Les obstacles auxquels se heurte l’emprunteuse dans son activité est le traitement des moutons (pas de vétérinaire dans la zone).
Pour continuer à améliorer son activité ou sa vie à la maison  elle veut l’augmentation de son fond de déroulement.
texts.en:
Sétou is the woman holding the ram’s horn. She is a good and honest Malian woman living in a rural area with her family. She is 44 years old and married but did not have the chance to go to school. She is the mother of one child, aged 18, who is in school. Her husband is a farmer and raises livestock to earn his living. Sétou has been fattening sheep for ten years. She always supplies herself at the local markets and make her sales at the same markets after fattening her sheep. 

She has turned to the financial services of the microfinance institution RMCR to support her work fattening sheep through the purchase of underweight rams, animal feed, millet bran, and medicines. The funds she receives from RMCR are invested in her work fattening sheep. This business is a passion for her, since she manages to support herself, as well as her child (clothing, food, healthcare, education). 

Her projected monthly profit is 5,000 francs CFA. The loan will help her to increase her income. The business obstacles this borrower runs up against include the medical care of the sheep (no veterinarians in the area). To continue to improve her business or her life at home, she wants to augment her working capital.

loans.use: to purchase sheep to sell later

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
El socio Vicente se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia, el socio los hace engordar y crecer a los ganados y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio por medio de este trabajo quiere salir adelante, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de ganados. El socio solicita el credito para comprar ganados.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Vicente continues to work in his livestock business, he fattens and grows the cattle and then sells them in different fairs, he works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m., through this work he wishes to get ahead, his dream is to grow his cattle sales business. He is requesting this loan in order to buy cattle.

The member is happy for the loan and is happy to complete the payments of his share.

loans.use: The member requests the loan in order to buy cattle.

loans.name: Akuvi  Emefa

texts.fr: Akuvi Emefa a 32 ans. Elle est mariée. Akuvi Emefa vend des produits laitiers. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. En ce moment, elle ne parvient pas à satisfaire toutes les demandes. Akuvi Emefa veut réinvestir dans l’activité et elle demande un prêt pour acheter des produits laitiers. À l’avenir, elle souhaite agrandir son activité et ouvrir une seconde boutique.
texts.en: Akuvi Emefa is 32 years old and married. She sells milk products, which she buys in Lomé. At this time, she is not able to satisfy the demand completely. She wants to reinvest in her business and is asking for a loan to purchase some milk products. For the future, her wish is to expand her business and open a second shop.

loans.use: to purchase milk products

loans.name: Toxiflor Group

texts.es:
Una comunidad mexiquense que se caracteriza por ser muy tranquila y muy extensa, a pesar del gran territorio los habitantes se conocen muy bien y llevan una relación de respeto y cordialidad. Ahí se integró un grupo conocido como Toxiflor ya que la representante tiene algunos invernaderos con dicho nombre.
   Don Vicente es un hombre muy trabajador y muy alegre que siempre hace reír a sus compañeros de grupo. Está casado con la señora Angelina desde hace veinticuatro años, juntos han formado una familia con dos hijos que ya son independientes. Vicente siempre había laborado en la Ciudad de México, pero desde hace ocho años su estilo de vida dio un giro pues conoció a Doña Domitila, la representante del grupo, dueña de varios invernaderos y quien le ofreció ayudarle a tener su propio negocio. A Vicente le pareció una de las mejores ideas, aceptó y ahora a aprendido muy bien la cría de la lombriz para producir abono orgánico, conocida como lombricaria o lombricomposta que pone en venta. Las lombrices se alimentan de frutas y verduras que les facilita Vicente y como resultado se obtiene el abono que resulta de mayor beneficio los que productos químicos.  
   Hace algunos meses, Vicente tuvo un accidente que lo alejó de su negocio y su esposa es quien se encarga del proceso de la lumbricaria mientras Vicente se recupera. “Cuando inicié con el negocio, doña Domitila me regalo solo dos kilos de lombriz” comenta, ahora gracias a ello su producción ha aumentado a 50 kilos de lombriz.
   Actualmente, Vicente no cuenta con una infraestructura o invernadero que le permita criar las lombrices por lo que utiliza cualquier recipiente de casa que ya no utilice. Con el préstamo comprara hule y tubos de metal para comenzar a sentar las bases de su invernadero ya que sueña con tener una estructura bien instalada que le ayude a aumentar la producción.
   Los demás integrantes del grupo son Doña Domitila y Ramón quienes invertirán en lombriz, Teresa en refrescos y Cornelio en zapatos.
*La fotografía fue tomada en el jardín de la presidencia municipal, Don Vicente es quien usa las muletas*
texts.en:
A Mexican community which is characterized by being very peaceful and extensive, in spite of the large territory the inhabitants know each other very well and maintain a relationship of respect and cordiality. There a group was formed known as Toxiflor since the representative has a few green houses with said name. 

Don Vicente is a very hardworking and happy man who always makes the others in his group laugh. He is married to Miss Angelina for the past 24 years, together they have formed a family with two sons who are now independent. Vincent has always worked in Mexico City, but eight years ago his lifestyle took a turn when he met Doña Domitila, the representative of the group, owner of various greenhouse and who offered to help him have his own business. To Vincent it seemed like a really great idea, he accepted and know has learned very well the raising of worms in order to produce organic fertilizer, known as wormery or worm-compost which he puts on sale. The worms feed on the fruits and vegetable which Vicente provides which results in  a fertilizer which is of greater benefit than those with chemical products.

  
A few months ago, Vicente had an accident which distanced him from his business and his wife is who carries on the process of wormery while Vicente recuperates. "When I began the business, Doña Domitila gave me only two kilos of worms" he comments, now thanks to her his production has grown to 50 kilos of worms.

Currently, Vicente does not have an infrastructure or greenhouse which allows him to grow worms for which reason he uses whatever container that is not used. With the loan he will buy rubber and metal tubes to start setting the bases of his greenhouse since he dreams of having a structure set up which  will help him to increase production.


The rest of the group members are Doña Domitila and Ramón who will invest in worms, Teresa in soft drinks and Cornelio in shoes.
*The photograph was taken in the garden of the mayor, Don Vicente is using crutches*

loans.use: WIll buy rubber and metal tubes

loans.name: Leoncio

texts.es:
El socio Leoncio se dedica al trabajo como maestro de construccion, el socio hace trabajo como pintados de casas y arregla casas, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio por medio de este trabaja saca adelante a su familia, el sueño el socio es tener una empresa de construccion.El socio solicita el crédito para comprar herramientas para construcción como cemento, yeso y arena.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Leoncio makes a living by working as a construction foreman, he works as a house painter as well as repairman, he works from 6:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m., through this work he is able to provide for his family, his dream is to have a construction company. He requests the loan in order to buy construction tools like cement, plaster, and sand.

The member is happy for the loan and commits himself to completing the payments of his share.

loans.use: The member requests the loan in order to buy construction tools such as cement, plaster, and sand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more inventory of home products to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start a new retail business

loans.name: Los Frutales Group

texts.es:
Los Frutales es un grupo conformado sólo por mujeres trabajadoras, alegres y preocupadas por el bienestar de su familia. La comunidad donde son originarias es muy pequeña pero muy grande en cuanto a calidad humana ya que los habitantes se caracterizan por su amabilidad y nobleza. Además, también intentan conservar sus tradiciones: los días de las celebraciones más importantes se reúnen en la iglesia central para escuchar música y presenciar a los danzantes, después, se deleitan con los fuegos artificiales en forma de toritos y castillos.
   Doña Natalia destaca por su gran espíritu emprendedor, contrajo matrimonio con el señor Luis desde hace veinte años y juntos han formado una familia con cuatro hijos quienes cursan distintos grados escolares. 
Para aportar ingresos en el hogar y la educación de sus hijos, Natalia inició un negocio desde hace diez años. Ella vende productos de belleza por catálogo. "Son productos que se venden con mucha facilidad y puedo obtener muy buenas ganancias"; ofrece la mercancía en escuelas, con sus familiares, con sus amistades y en cualquier otro lado donde pueda encontrar algún cliente potencial, lo que le ha dado buenos resultados. A los clientes más seguros, Natalia les ofrece facilidades de pago.
   Una de sus metas es poder establecer su negocio en un local fijo para evitar las largas caminatas. "Me esfuerzo mucho todos los días pues es un negocio que deja muy buenos resultados”. Esta vez, con la ayuda del préstamo podrá comprar más productos como perfumes, labiales, maquillajes etc.
   Los demás integrantes del grupo son Paulina quien invertirá en una tienda de abarrotes; Griselda, Hilda y Damaris invertirán en la compra de borregos; Natalia y Concepción invertirán por su parte en ropa y Gabriela en aves de corral.

*La fotografía fue tomada en su centro de reunión, doña Natalia es quien viste la blusa a cuadros *
texts.en:
Los Frutales is a group made up of only hardworking, happy women concerned about the wellbeing of their families. The community where they're from is very small but very large in regards to the human quality since the inhabitants are characterized by their friendliness and nobleness. Additionally, they also try to conserve their traditions: they meet on the most important celebration days in the central church to listen to music and witness the dancers. After, they delight themselves with fireworks in the forms of little bulls and castles.

Natalia stands out because of her great entrepreneurial spirit. She made a marriage contract with Luis twenty years ago and together they've formed a family with four children who are enrolled in different school grades.

To support income in the home and the education of their children, Natalia started a business ten years ago. She sells beauty products by catalog. "They are products that are sold very easily and I can obtain very good profits." She offers the merchandise in schools, with her family members, with her friends and in whatever other place where she can find a potential client, which has given her good results. To the more secure clients, Natalia offers them payment facilities.

One of her goals is to be able to establish her business in a fixed place to avoid the long walks. "I push myself a lot every day, well it's a business that leaves very good results." This time, with the help of the loan she will be able to buy more products like perfumes, lipsticks, makeup, etc.

The remaining members of the group are Paulina who will invest in a grocery store, Griselda, Hilda and Damaris will invest in the purchase of sheep, Natalia and Concepción will invest on their part in clothing and Gabriela in poultry.

* The photograph was taken in their meeting center, Natalia is the one seen dressed in the checkered blouse. *

loans.use: to buy more products like perfumes, lipsticks, makeup, etc.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: La señora Patricia es una persona humilde, sencilla y trabajadora que todos los días está en el campo dedicándose al rubro de la agricultura, produciendo diversos cultivos como son papa, arveja, maíz y otros para la venta, de esta forma genera ingresos para sustentar a su familia. La señora Patricia vive junto a su esposo y tiene cinco hijos que dependen económicamente de ellos. La vivienda donde habitan es de construcción rustica hecha de adobe y techo de calamina. La señora Patricia desea ampliar la producción de sus cultivos por lo que necesita de apoyo económico para dicho fin, por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, semillas y pequeños ganados para la crianza de los mismos. De esta manera generará mas recursos económicos para el bienestar y educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Patricia is a very humble, sincere and hardworking person who every day is in the field dedicating herself to the work of agriculture. She's producing diverse crops such as potato, peas, corn and others for selling. In this manner, she generates income to sustain her family. Patricia lives with her husband and they have five children who depend on her economically. The home where they live is of rustic construction, made of adobe and a roof of corrugated iron.

Patricia wishes to increase the production of her crops, which is why she needs economic support for said goal. Therefore, she is applying for a loan for the purchase of agricultural supplies like fertilizers, seeds and small cattle for raising them. In this manner, she will generate more economic resources for the wellbeing and education of her children.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like fertilizers, seeds and small cattle for raising them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothing inventory

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es:
Santos, de 48 años de edad, es un padre de familia ejemplar, está casado desde hace 25 años, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, actualmente vive con su esposa, una hija y 2 nietos, ya que sus otros hijos han emigrado a otro país. 

Santos, es una persona responsable y trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo ha sacado a su familia adelante, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos, además por temporada siembra sandías; el terreno donde siembra está a un kilómetro de distancia desde su casa, en el trabajo su esposa le ayuda y cuando sus hijos estaban con él también le ayudaban. 

El préstamo que Santos está solicitando es para pagar el alquiler de la tierra donde cultivará, ya que tiene planeado cultivar 21,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y necesita preparar la tierra y pagar mano de obra.

Santos, sueña con ver a sus nietos graduados de alguna carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Santos, who is 48-years old, is an exemplary head of household.  He has been married for 25 years.  He didn't have the opportunity to go to school.  He currently lives with his wife, one daughter and two grandchildren.  His other children have emigrated to another country. 

Santos is a responsible and hard-working person who, through a lot of effort, has gotten his family ahead.  He makes his living growing staple grains and, when in season, watermelons.  The land he plants is one kilometer from his house.  His wife helps him with his work, and when his children lived with him, they helped him too. 

The loan that Santos is requesting is to pay the rent on the land he will plant.  He plans to plant 21,000 square meters of corn, and he needs to prepare the land and pay for labor. 

Santos hopes to see his grandchildren graduate with university degrees.

loans.use: to pay the rent on the land he will plant.

loans.name: Teegawende Moussa Group

texts.fr:
Mr MOUSSA est responsable du groupe TEEGAWENDE MOUSSA. Marié, il est père de 04enfants. Le plus âgé a 17ans et le moins âgé a 03ans. 03 vont à l’école. Il a 07 personnes en charge.
Mr fait le maraichage depuis 15ans. Il s’approvisionne  au barrage dans son village.
Il veut s’acheter 10sacs d’engrais.
Avec ses bénéfices, il veut construire une maison d'habitant.Il ambitionne scolariser ses enfants et pouvoir s'acheter une nouvelle moto.
texts.en: Mr. MOUSSA is the official of the group TEEGAWENDE MOUSSA. He is a married father of four children. The oldest is 17 years old, and the youngest is 3. Three go to school. He has seven persons to support. Mr MOUSSA has been operating a market garden for fifteen years. He gets his supplies at the [dam or roadblock] in his village. He wants to purchase 10 sacks of fertilizer. With the profits, he wants to build a house. His ambition is to provide schooling for his children and purchase a new motorbike.

loans.use: to purchase 10 sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Kayissan

texts.fr: Agée de 28 ans, Kayissan est une femme mariée et mère de deux enfants. Pour exercer ses activités, Kayissan vit à Baguida et vend des mèches, des tissages et des produits cosmétiques dans son quartier pour ainsi gagner son revenu. Kayissan s’approvisionne six fois par mois au marché local. Pour commander des mèches et des pommades, Kayissan demande ce crédit pour réaliser son achat et trouver le gain nécessaire pour aider son mari à soutenir les charges de la famille.
texts.en: Kayissan, aged 28, is a married woman and the mother of two. To operate her business, she lives in Baguida and sells hair extensions, weaves, and cosmetic products in her district to earn an income. She gets her supplies six times a month at the local market. To put in a special order for hair extensions and ointments, Kayissan is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and to obtain the profits necessary to help out her husband in covering family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 2 dozen hair extensions and 6 dozen of ointments

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: A 42 ans, Afi est une femme mariée et vit avec quatre enfants à Kpota. Bien consciente de son état elle vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans son quartier afin de générer un bénéfice pouvant couvrir les charges quotidiennes. Afi  achète son stock auprès de ses fournisseurs trois fois par mois et en tire assez de profits. Afi désire ce crédit pour commandes des tomates, des épices et des bidons d’huile afin de trouver son bénéfice pour subvenir favorablement aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: A 42 ans, Afi est une femme mariée et vit avec quatre enfants à Kpota. Bien consciente de son état elle vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans son quartier afin de générer un bénéfice pouvant couvrir les charges quotidiennes. Afi  achète son stock auprès de ses fournisseurs trois fois par mois et en tire assez de profits. Afi désire ce crédit pour commandes des tomates, des épices et des bidons d’huile afin de trouver son bénéfice pour subvenir favorablement aux besoins de sa famille.

loans.use: acheter 4 paniers de tomates, 5 tas d'épices et 3 bidons d'huile

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 34 ans, Abla est une femme qui vit Adakpamé. Commerçante ambulante, Abla vend des cures dent dans son quartier et ses alentours afin d’avoir son revenu. Pour répondre efficacement aux besoins, Abla s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Abla demande ce crédit pour commander des troncs de cure dent afin de réaliser encore plus de revenus pour satisfaire favorablement ses clients et subvenir à ses besoins.
texts.en: Abla is a married 34-year old woman who lives in Adakpamé. She makes a living as an itinerant vendor, selling toothpicks in her neighborhood and nearby. In order to meet the demand properly, she stocks up at the market once a month. Abla is requesting this loan to buy boxes of tooth picks  so as to  meet customer demand, increase her revenues and cover her expenses.

loans.use: to buy two boxes of tooth picks for resale.

loans.name: Selina

texts.en:
Selina is 48 years old, married to Yuvinalis, and she supports 7 family members.
 
She has been a farmer for the last 24 years and the business earns her an income of 10,000 KES per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to purchase fertilizer and maize seeds for planting to get a better harvest and meet client needs for food supply in the market.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her hope is to be financially stable and expand her agricultural sector.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and maize seeds for planting

loans.name: Handson

texts.en:
Handson is a 46 years old, married to Hellen, and he supports 6 family members. 

He has been a farmer for the last 15 years and the business earns him a monthly income of 11,000 KES. 

He has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya, which he plans to use to purchase sprays such as herbicides, insecticides, and fertilizers to increase nutrients and kill weeds and insects that damage crops and harvest better produce for sale. 

He plans to use the gained profit to repay the loan, expand his agricultural sector, and educate his children to higher levels of education. 

His hope is to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase sprays such as herbicides, insecticides, and fertilizers so as to increase nutrients and kill weeds and insects that damage crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ice, gelatin, bread, dressing, cold cuts, etc. so he can continue to work

loans.name: Mawuko

texts.fr: Mawuko est une femme mariée âgée de 32 ans et vit à Adidogomé avec son mari et ses deux enfants. Mawuko frit des beignets à base de la farine de blé pour vendre et gagner son revenu afin de favoriser une éducation adéquate à ses enfants. Grâce à ce commerce Mawuko arrive à faire une bonne épargne et s’approvisionne une fois par mois dans une boutique du quartier. Afin de disposer d’un stock important et vendre plus sa marchandise, Mawuko demande ce prêt pour acheter des sacs de farine de blé et atteindre ses objectifs.
texts.en: Mawuko is a married woman, 32 years old, who lives in Adidogomé with her husband and her two children. She fries beignets made from wheat flour to sell and earn an income for the sake of an adequate education for her children. Thanks to this business, she manages to make a good profit margin. She gets her supplies once a month at a neighborhood shop. In order to have a significant inventory and to sell more product, Mawuko is asking for this loan to purchase sacks of wheat flour for achieving her goals.

loans.use: to purchase 3 sacks of wheat flour

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Agée de 30 ans, Adjo est une femme mariée et mère de quatre enfants. Adjo vit à Adidogomé pour exercer son activité de vente d’articles de mercerie. Ce commerce lui permet de venir en aide aux besoins de sa famille et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire. Adjo s’approvisionne huit fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des fils à coudre et des rouleaux de doublure, Adjo demande ce prêt pour acheter ses produits et augmenter son bénéfice pour aider ses enfants à s’épanouir.
texts.en: Adjo, aged 30, is a married woman and the mother of four. She lives in Adidogomé to operate her business selling sewing supplies. This business enables her to help out her husband in meeting the needs of her family and to realize a good profit margin. She gets her supplies eight times a month at the market. To put in an order for thread and rolls of lining material, Adjo is asking for this loan to purchase her goods and to increase her profits, so as to help her children to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase 6 rolls of lining material and 5 dozen spools of thread

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 47 years old and she supports 8 family members. 

She has been a farmer for the last 15 years and the business earns her an income of KES 11,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer for her farming activity.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her hope is to be financially stable and expand her business sector.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer for her farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more retail stock for sale to meet his customers' demands.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers and herbicides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more fruits for sale in the market.

loans.name: Malgrekatonewende Hamado Group

texts.fr:
Mr HAMADO est responsable du groupe MALGREKATONEWENDE HAMADO. Marié, il est père de 10enfants. Le plus âgé a 20ans et le moins âgé a 01an. 05 vont à l’école. Il a 13 personnes en charge.
Mr fait le maraichage et l' élevage depuis 1998 soit 17ans. Il s’approvisionne  au barrage et au marché de son village.
Il veut s’acheter 04sacs d’engrais et un bœuf.
Avec ses bénéfices, il veut réinvestir dans son activité.Il ambitionne bien s'occuper de sa famille en scolarisant ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mr. HAMADO is the official of the group MALGREKATONEWENDE HAMADO. He is a married father of ten children. The oldest is 20 years old, and the youngest is 1. Five go to school. He has thirteen persons in his care. 

Mr. HAMADO has been operating a market garden and raising livestock since 1998, thus for about 17 years. He gets his supplies at the [dam or roadblock] and at the market in his village. He wants to purchase 4 sacks of fertilizer and an ox. With the profits, he wants to reinvest in his business. His ambition is to take good care of his family by providing education for his children.

loans.use: to purchase 4 sacks of fertilizer and an ox

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more fruits and vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more plastics for sale to meet her customers` demand.

loans.name: Orbelina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Orbelina tiene 39 años de edad, no sabe leer ni escribir, actualmente está acompañada y su pareja realiza labores agrícolas; tienen 4 hijos los cuales están estudiando en la escuela que está muy cerca de su vivienda.


Orbelina se dedica a vender frutas y verduras en una gasolinera, actividad que realiza desde hace muchos años y que aprendió de una amiga suya, ella tiene que caminar varios metros para llegar hasta su lugar de trabajo.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar tejas y cuartones para poner el techo de su casa.

Ella sueña con tener  una vivienda digna, cómoda y segura para toda su familia, además de poder darles una buena educación a sus hijos en un futuro, todo esto lo espera lograr con mucho sacrificio y  esfuerzos junto a su compañero de vida.
texts.en:
Orbelina is 39-yeasr old.  She doesn't know how to read or write.  She is currently married, and her husband works in agriculture.  They have four children who go to a school that is very close to their home.  

Orbelina makes her living selling fruits and vegetables in a gas station.  She has been doing that work for many years; she learned it from a friend of hers.  Orbelina has to walk quite a few meters to get to her place of work. 

Orbelina needs the loan to purchase tile and beams to put a roof on her house. 

Orbelina hopes to give her family a dignified, comfortable and safe home.  In addition, she wants to give her children a good education in the future.  She expects to achieve all this through a lot of sacrifice and hard work on behalf of herself and her husband.

loans.use: to purchase tiles and beams to put a roof on her house.

loans.name: Nongtaaba De  Sapaaga Group

texts.fr:
Mme SALAMATA est responsable du groupe NONGTAABA DE SAPAAGA. Mariée, elle est mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 05ans et le moins âgé a 03ans. Personne ne va à l’école.Elle a une personne en charge.
Mme fait de l'élevage depuis plus de 03ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de Bléyagga.
Elle veut s’acheter 04 animaux.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut réinvestir dans son activité. Elle ambitionne scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. SALAMATA is the official of the group NONGTAABA DE SAPAAGA. She is a married mother of two children. The oldest is 5 years old, and the youngest is 3. None goes to school. She has one person to support. 

Ms. SALAMATA has been raising livestock for over three years. She gets her supplies at the Bléyagga market. She wants to purchase 4 animals. With the profits, she wants to reinvest in her business. Her ambition is to provide schooling for her children.

loans.use: to purchase 4 animals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more second hand clothes to sell

loans.name: Fahriddin

texts.ru: Это Фахриддин. Он житель города Душанбе. Ему 24 года. Фахридин умный и самостоятельный парень. Он в городе живет вместе отцом и матерью. Его родители без работы. В семье только работает Фахриддин. Он мастер ювелирных изделий. Фахриддин изготавливает красивые женские серьги. Он занят своим делом уже 4.5 года. Фахриддин арендует место в торговом центре. Он собирается расширить деятельность. Ему необходимо купить серебро и другие принадлежности для изготовления серьги. Фахриддину нужно Ваша помощь. Вы можете поддержать его! В будущем Фахриддин планирует открыть свою ювелирную точку.
texts.en:
This is Fahridden.  He is 24 years old and lives in Dushanbe with his mother and father.  Fahridden is an intelligent and independent young man.  His mother and father don't have jobs. Fahridden is the only one in the family who works.   He is a jeweler and makes beautiful women's earrings.  He has been in this business for 4.5 years and he rents a stall in a shopping center.

Fahridden is planning to expand his business and he needs to buy silver and other materials for making earrings.  Fahridden needs your help.  You can support him!  Fahridden plans to open his own jewelry store in the future.

loans.use: to buy silver and other materials to expand his business.

loans.name: Priska

texts.en:
Priska is 50 years old, married, and blessed with 4 children. She is a farmer and has been in this business for 5 years. 

She will use the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm and hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her future hopes are to improve her farming, make more income, and support her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm to get more farm produce

loans.name: Ana Hilda

texts.es:
Ana, requiere de un nuevo crédito con el que podrá comprar mesas y sillas, así mismo reparara la infraestructura del cafetín, de esa forma sus clientes se sentirán cómodos y su negocio tendrá mejor imagen.
