Su negocio ha mejorado mucho la rentabilidad y conserva su mismo grupo familiar, esto es posible por la buena utilización del crédito anterior.
texts.en:
Ana needs a  new loan with which she will be able to buy tables and chairs. She will also repair the infrastructure of the cafe. In this way, her customers will feel comfortable and her business will have a better image.

Her business has improved a lot in profitability, and she maintains her same family group. This is possible because of the good use of the previous loan.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs and to repair the infrastructure of her cafe so that her customers will feel comfortable

loans.name: St. John's Seminary School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Fr. Francis. He is the Rector of St. John's Seminary School, a boys' school in the rural area of Kasese with 250 students. St. John's School has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. Installing a water filtration system will therefore save the school money in the long term as the cost of firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the school to purchase a UV water treatment system with a 450 litre tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day. 

St. John's School will repay the loan from school fees, which it collects each term. Fr. Francis ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve his students’ concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from water-borne diseases as well as increase the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: To purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Kisharara Twimukye Group

texts.en:
Kisharara Twimukye group is located in Kisharara, Rwenyanja, Buyanja, Rukungiri district. The group is comprised of six people, among whom are widows and single parents.

Adrine, second from the left, is a widow who looks after four children, three of whom are still attending school. She works in agriculture to earn a living and also she has a shop where she sells a few items like local brew, sodas, and clothes, among other items.
 
She applied for a loan in UGAFODE of UGX 1,000,000 so that she could add in more stock so that she could earn extra money and pay for her children’s school fees. She is really very grateful to UGAFODE for the financial support.

loans.use: To boost his retail trade business

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta de 57 años de edad es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica desde hace 3 años a la crianza de pollos, actividad que le ha permitido llevar el sustento a su hogar. Marta vive junto a su esposo en vivienda de su propiedad, la cual han lograd construir con mucho esfuerzo. Marta desea aumentar su producción, ya que cada día cuenta con más clientes que solicitan sus productos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pollos, concentrado y vitaminas para aumentar su negocio de venta de pollos.
texts.en:
Marta, who is 57 years old, is an entrepreneurial woman who has raised chickens for 3 years, a business that has allowed her to bring sustenance to her household. Marta lives with her husband in a house of their own, which they managed to build with great effort. 

Marta wants to increase her production, since every day she has more customers who seek her products. For this reason, she is applying to FUSAI for a loan to invest in chickens, feed concentrate, and vitamins to enlarge her business of selling chickens.

loans.use: to invest in chickens, feed concentrate, and vitamins to enlarge her business of selling chickens.

loans.name: Zulma

texts.es: La Señora Zulma, tiene 18 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, económicamente es independiente, se dedica a la agricultura. Tiene ventas estacionales de 90 cargas de papa y 60 cargas de haba en vaina verde, la venta de sus productos lo realiza en la feria semanal del lugar donde vive, la señora requiere un crédito para la compra de abono orgánico, ganado vacuno lechero 1 cabeza y productos agroquímicos, ya que sus ahorros los invirtió en la compra de terreno agrícola. Por último, la señora con estas compras va a tener mejores ingresos e incrementará su patrimonio familiar y de esa manera podrá mejorar su nivel de vida en beneficio de su familia.
texts.en:
Zulma is 18 years old, single, and financially independent.  She makes a living in agriculture.  She has seasonal sales of 90 loads of potatoes and 60 loads of green beans.  She sells her products at the local weekly fair where she lives.  

Zulma needs a loan for the purchase of organic fertilizer, one dairy cow and agrochemical products, since she invested her savings in the purchase of land for farming.  Ultimately, with these purchases, Zulma is going to have higher income and will increase her family wealth, and thus can improve her standard of living for the benefit of her family.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer, a dairy cow, and agrochemical products to increase her income for the benefit of her family.

loans.name: Enosi

texts.en: Enosi lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda, and deals in cocoa growing and selling to raise income for family support. His clients are mainly cocoa companies that provide quick market for their cocoa. He gets additional income from livestock farming by looking after cattle, though his main challenges are limited capital to pay his workers on time since the companies take long to pay them. He hopes to improve his cocoa business in future, build a permanent house and also educate his 12 children.  He has asked for a loan of two million UGX to pay for labor for people harvesting his cocoa.

loans.use: to pay for labor for people harvesting his cocoa.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy seeds and insecticides

loans.name: Alinah

texts.en:
Alinah, 29, lives in Finetown with her husband and her 7-year-old son who attends school.

She is soft-spoken and can be mistaken for a school-girl due to her small demeanor. Alinah, however, runs her own daycare center from the backyard of her house. 

She is requesting a loan to buy building materials such as window frames and steel door frames, as well as roofing sheets and block bricks. With the Kiva loan, Alinah will be able to upgrade two rooms at the center that were partially incomplete.
 
She aspires to one day buy land and build a fully equipped daycare center serving the community, as well as house destitute children who don’t have parents.

loans.use: to buy block bricks, cement, window frames and door frames

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia is a 62-year old mother of three children aged 36, 35, and 31. 

She is an honest and responsible person who loves to take care of children. She continues to work hard even in her old age, running a bustling and active daycare center.

She is requesting a Kiva loan to buy a kitchen unit and renovate the school yard as well as install a shade awning so that the children can be protected from adverse weather whenever they have outdoor activities. Sylvia is passionate about nurturing children and says that "Children learn through play". 

Her dream is to open another daycare center and create more jobs for young women in her community.

loans.use: to buy a kitchen unit, and pay for installation of a yard awning and paving

loans.name: Andriniaina

texts.fr:
28 ans, marié, Andriniaina est un père de famille très consciencieux. Il a trois enfants de 8, 6 et 4 ans qui suivent actuellement leurs études primaires dans une école privée. Sa famille vie ensemble et heureuse dans une maison en location.
Il exerce  depuis 2008 une activité de vente de chaussures à l'occasion et il y est aidé par sa femme. Les deux époux exploitent ensemble l'affaire. Il demande un crédit pour développer et étendre l'activité ou plus précisément renforcer le fonds de roulement. Il veut augmenter les quantités et diversifier les modèles.
 Son objectif est de pouvoir ouvrir plusieurs points de vente dans différents quartiers environnants. afin d'augmenter le bénéfice et le revenu.
C'est un père de famille qui s'efforce chaque jour d'offrir à sa famille le meilleur, son rêve le plus cher est de construire une maison, offrir une meilleur scolarisation à ses enfants et une vie confortable à sa famille.
texts.en:
Andriniaina, aged 28, is the very conscientious father of a family. He has three children, aged 8, 6, and 4, who are currently in a private primary school. His family is happy living together in a rented house. Since 2008, Andriniaina has been selling secondhand shoes, and his wife helps him. The couple jointly run the business. 

Andriniaina is asking for a loan to develop and expand his business, or to be exact, to bolster his working capital. He wants to increase the number of models and to diversify them. His goal is to be able to open several sales outlets in different districts nearby, so as to increase his profit and income. 

This is a father who strives each day to provide the best for his family. His dearest dream is to build a house and to provide excellent schooling for his children and a comfortable life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase 4 bales of secondhand shoes

loans.name: Shorena

texts.en:
Shorena, 35 years old housekeeper woman, lives in Kaspi district. She has 2 school-aged children, and her husband, who is the only breadwinner in the family. Her husband's parents also live with her.  Her husband gets 300 GEL fixed salary per month which is hardly enough to cover the basic needs of a 6 member family, so the family lives in poverty. 

Due to the above mentioned situation, Shorena wants to help her husband in covering some of their family's needs.  In the region there is a high unemployment rate, but self-employment helps inhabitants to make a living.  So, she decided to start a clothing trading business with the loan, but the local credit providers usually demand experience and some stable income from the borrowers. With the loan of 800 USD, she will purchase clothing at wholesale price and sell them in her community door-to-door. 

Shorena will get the chance to gain financial stability and earn a monthly income from her clients through the district. She will improve the family's living condition and give her children a good education to progress in life. 

Shorena awaits your support.

loans.use: to start her own clothing business

loans.name: Andrea

texts.en:
Andrea has a boyfriend and she lives with him for 11 years.  The couple has 2 kids that are going to school.

Andrea sells milk. She learned how to take care of cows when she was a child.   

Andrea needs a loan to buy a milking cow, because she plans to make cheese and to sell more milk.

She hopes you can help her.  She is healthy and she wants a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow

loans.name: Willma

texts.en:
Willma is a single mother and she lives in her father's house.  Willma sells milk, and her father is a mason.

Willma needs a loan to buy a milking cow, because she wants to improve her business, and her father is enthusiastic to help her with that business.

Willma is healthy.   She has experience, and she has a child to feed.  She hopes you can help her.  

Willma also makes cheese.  In the picture you can see the molds she uses to make the cheese.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow

loans.name: Grupo La Pikus Group

texts.es:
En una comunidad del Estado de México se formó un grupo llamado La Pikus, el nombre lo eligieron las integrantes por ser el mote de la hija de una de ellas a la cual quieren mucho. La comunidad se caracteriza porque los pobladores se dedican a la elaboración de productos artesanales hechos con lana; durante todo el año realizan distintas prendas como gorras, guantes, bufandas y calentadores. 
   Los integrantes están nerviosos pero entusiasmados ya que es la primera vez que solicitan un préstamo a VisionFund. Imelda es la representante del grupo, es muy alegre y muy trabajadora, a pesar de su corta edad, siempre se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia. Está casada con Pablo desde hace nueve años y juntos han formado una familia con dos niñas quienes se encuentran cursando la educación primaria.
    Hace ocho años Imelda abrió un taller de costura debido a que los padres de su esposo se dedican a la misma actividad y realmente era productiva. Con esfuerzo y constancia, Imelda y su esposo lograron comprar las primeras máquinas y ahora los identifican como uno de los mejores confeccionistas de la región. Imelda elabora todo tipo de ropa como pantalones, suéteres, uniformes, faldas, blusas, chalecos, entre otras. Sus ventas las realizan por pedido o directamente salen a plazas para ofrecer la mercancía al público en general. 
   “Todos los días desde muy temprano nos ponemos a trabajar en el taller pero si tenemos pedidos pendientes debemos trabajar a marchas forzadas para entregar a tiempo y no quedar mal con el cliente” comentó Imelda quien siempre se muestra de buen humor. Con el préstamo podrá adquirir tela, cierres, agujas, hilos, resortes, etc. para confeccionar uniformes ya que julio y agosto son los meses en los que hay más demanda de este tipo de mercancía. La meta de Imelda es hacer crecer su negocio para poder brindar oportunidades de trabajo a más personas y así tener la ayuda necesaria para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. 
   Los demás miembros del grupo son María de los Ángeles C. y Yanet que invertirán en su propio taller de costura; Carmen, en ropa; Verónica, en pollos, Ana Karen, en una refaccionaria; María de los Ángeles P., en su club nutricional; Daniel, en equipos de sonido y Diana, en muebles.

*La fotografía fue tomada en las escaleras del kiosco, Imelda es quien viste el suéter negro*
texts.en:
La Pikus Group formed in a community in the state of Mexico.  The members chose the name because it's the nickname of the daughter of one of the members whom they love very much.  The community is known because of the residents who make handmade crafts with wool.  Throughout the year they make a variety of garments such as caps, gloves, scarves, and leg warmers.

The members are nervous but excited because it's the first time they've asked VisionFund for a loan.  Imelda is the group representative.  She's very happy and hardworking, despite her young age.  She's always concerned with her family's well-being.  She has been married to Pablo for nine years and together they have a family with two little girls who are currently in elementary school.

Imelda opened a tailor shop eight years ago because her husband's parents are in the same line of work and it was very productive.  With effort and perseverance, Imelda and her husband managed to buy the first machines, and now they are known among the best dressmakers in the region.  Imelda makes all types of clothing: pants, sweaters, uniforms, skirts, blouses, vests, and other garments.  She makes sales to order or they go out to plazas to sell merchandise to the public in general.

"We start working in the shop very early every day because if we have pending orders we have to work as quickly as possible to meet the deadline and satisfy the client," commented Imelda, who's always in a good mood.  Her goal is to grow her business so she can offer work opportunities to more people and have the help she needs to satisfy customer demand.

With the loan Imelda will be able to get fabric, zippers, needles, thread, elastic, and the like to make uniforms, because July and August are the months in which she has most demand for this type of merchandise.

The other members of the group and their investments are María de los Ángeles C. and Yanet, a tailor shop; Carmen, clothing; Verónica, chickens, Ana Karen, a repair shop; María de los Ángeles P., a nutritional group; Daniel, sound equipment; and Diana, furniture.

The photograph was taken on the steps of the bandstand.  Imelda's wearing a black sweater.

loans.use: to buy materials such as fabric, thread, zippers, etc.

location.town: SAN PEDRO DE LOS BAÑOS, IXTLAHUACA

loans.name: Teegawende Group

texts.fr:
Mme KOUDEMA représente le groupe TEEGAWENDE. Elle se porte bien ainsi que les autres membres. Mariée, elle est mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 28ans et le moins âgé a 18ans. 03 vont  à l’école.
Mme fait la restauration depuis 12ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. 
Elle veut s’acheter 01sac haricot, 02bidons d’huile (20l) et une rangée de bois.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut réinvestir dans son activité. Mme ambitionne  agrandir son champ d’activité et mieux entretenir ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. KOUDEMA represents the group TEEGAWENDE. She is doing well healthwise, and so are the other members. She is a married mother of four children. The oldest is 28 years old, and the youngest is 18. Three go to school. 

Ms. KOUDEMA has been a restauranteur for twelve years. She gets her supplies at the market in her sector. She wants to purchase a sack of beans, two 20-liter containers of oil, and a unit of firewood. With the profits, she wants to reinvest in her business. Her ambition is to expand her field of business and to take better care of her children.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of beans, 2 containers of oil, and a unit of firewood

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
José, es un joven soltero que vive con su padre y sus hermanos, su madre hace un año que falleció; decidió hace tres años independizarse económicamente y ayudar a su papá con los gastos del hogar, su negocio es cultivar maíz para abastecer a su familia de alimento y poder vender otra parte para generar recursos económicos, trabaja en dicha actividad de lunes a sábado, su padre le enseño el oficio.
Invertirá en semilla, fertilizantes, abono y plaguicidas, con estos materiales podrá aumentar el área de cultivo y darle un buen trato para lograr una cosecha abundante, espera que la inversión sea de beneficio para su negocio y para su familia.
Sus sueños son continuar trabajando y tener un patrimonio para formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
José is a young, single man who lives with his father and his siblings. His mother died a year ago. He decided three years ago to become independent economically and help his father with the household expenses. His business is raising corn to supply his family with food and to be able to sell another part [of his crop] to generate economic resources. He works in this activity from Monday to Saturday. His father taught him this work.

He will invest in seed, fertilizers, compost, and pesticides. With these materials he will be able to expand the area he cultivates and give it good treatment in order to achieve an abundant harvest. He hopes that the investment will be beneficial for his business and for his family.

His dreams are to continue working and to have a patrimony in order to form his own family.

loans.use: to invest in seeds, fertilizers, compost, and pesticides. With these materials he will be able to increase the area he cultivates and give it good treatment in order to achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.name: Oscar Arístides

texts.es:
Oscar de 54 años de edad, estudió solamente hasta tercer grado pues sus padres mejor le enseñaron a trabajar, solo vive con su esposa pues sus hijos ya viven aparte.


Actualmente, Oscar se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, además tiene vacas las cuales ordeña para vender la leche y sus derivados y su esposa es quien le ayuda en dichas actividades productivas.


 Él necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas para la siembra de maíz y maicillo.

 Él sueña con tener más vacas y aumentar la producción de leche y espera lograrlo con esfuerza y la ayuda de los créditos.
texts.en:
Oscar, 54 years old, only studied until third grade since his parents taught him to work instead. He lives with only his wife since his children already live separately. 

Oscar currently works cultivating corn and sorghum. He also has cows which he milks to sell the milk and milk products. His wife helps him with the aforementioned work. 

He needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies for planting corn and sorghum.

He dreams of having more cows and increasing milk production. He hopes to achieve this with effort and help from the loan.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for planting corn and sorghum.

loans.name: Fredy Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander, de 23 años de edad, está soltero, estudio hasta quinto grado y vive en casa junto a sus padres.

Alexander, es motorista en una fabrica de bloques, tiene tres años de estar laborando ahí, antes de obtener el empleo, se dedicaba a la agricultura.

Alexander, solicita el crédito para comprar una motocicleta, porque se le dificulta llegar a su lugar de trabajo.

El sueño de Alexander, es poder construir su propia vivienda y tener una familia.
texts.en:
Alexander is 23 years old and single. He studied until fifth grade and lives at home with his parents. 

Alexander is a driver at a cement block factory. He has been working there for three years. Before obtaining this job, he worked in agriculture. 

Alexander requests the loan to buy a motorcycle because it is difficult for him to get home from work. Alexander's dream is to build his own home and to have a family.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Mimose

texts.fr: Mimose vit à Savanne à Palle, Hinche. Elle vend des produits alimentaires depuis 7 ans à son domicile. Le prêt lui permet d’augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Mimose lives in Savanne, in Palle, Hinche. She has been selling grocery items for seven years out of her home. The loan is enabling her to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to increase her inventory

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce lives in Masindi-Uganda. She is a hardworking married woman and mother of six children.   

She used the previous loan to buy new clothes and materials to sell.  She sells spare parts in addition to clothes to boost her income. She has been in business since 1996 in order to support her family. 

She is now in need of a loan to buy spare parts for selling.  Joyce desires to educate her children, though inadequate capital hinders her dream.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to sell

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es:
Ana, está haciendo la solicitud de un nuevo crédito para invertirlo en pollitas de engorde y concentrado para alimentarlas, así mantendrá la granja de gallinas indias surtida y obtendrá los ingresos con que cubre los gastos familiares.
Para ella el préstamo anterior le ha sido de ayuda para mantenerse trabajando en la crianza de aves de corral y junto a su esposo práctica la producción de granos básicos, ha tenido dificultades de salud pero con mucha fe las está superando.
texts.en:
Ana is requesting a new loan to invest in chickens to be fattened and concentrated feed to nourish them. This way she will keep the native chicken farm stocked and obtain the income with which she covers the family's costs. 

The previous loan has been helpful in continuing to work raising fowl. She works producing basic grains along with her husband. She has had difficulties with her health but with a lot of faith, she is overcoming them.

loans.use: to invest in chickens to be fattened and concentrated feed to nourish them and to in this way keep the native chicken farm well stocked.

loans.name: Ani

texts.en:
Ani, is 20-year-old single woman who lives in Kutaisi City. She lives alone and goes to the University. Ani has no source of income, as she has no employment.  Her mother died several months ago and she was left alone. The only income she gets rarely, is transfers from her sister from abroad. Ani can't even meet her basic needs and requires financial support to start her own business and make her own income. She couldn’t receive a loan from the local financial institutions, because of their requirements to have business experience or stable revenue, until the Start Up program began, which is a joint product of Kiva and Credo. 

The program allows poor people Like Ani to get a chance for starting or re-starting a business. She plans to purchase jewelry at wholesale prices and will sell it to her classmates at increased prices. This will give her a chance to earn income and become financially independent. 

With the help of the Start Up program, Ani will be able to improve her living condition and progress in life.

loans.use: to purchase jewelry to sell

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
Mateo, de 42 años de edad, se dedica a la pesca, está casado, es padre de familia de tres hijos.

Mateo, desde que tenia 13 años de edad aprendió a pescar, su padre desde muy pequeño le inculcó esta labor.

Mateo, necesita el crédito para comprar lámina, madera, clavos y otros materiales para la reparación de su vivienda.

A futuro Mateo, sueña con una vivienda totalmente remodelada.
texts.en:
Mateo is 42 years old and works in fishing. He is married and father to a family of three children. Mateo learned how to fish at age 13. From a young age his father instilled this work in him. 

Mateo needs the loan to buy sheet metal, wood, nails and other materials for repairing his home. Mateo dreams of a future with a completely remodeled home.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, wood, nails and other materials for repairing his home.

loans.name: Juan De La Cruz

texts.es:
Juan, de 32 años de edad, es agricultor, está acompañado y vive con su pareja y sus 2 hijos, los cuales se encuentran estudiando. 

Juan, desde pequeño aprendió el trabajo agrícola gracias a su padre, actualmente siembra alrededor de 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz. 
  
El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar maíz, fertilizantes y pesticidas, ya que comenzaron a caer las primeras lluvias y quiere ser de los primeros en sembrar.
 
Juan, sueña con tener una buena cosecha de maíz, para generar los ingresos suficientes para el sustento de su familia, además desea que sus hijos estudien y se conviertan en profesionales.
texts.en:
Juan is 32 years old.  He is a farmer.  He is in a relationship and lives with his partner and their two children, who are in school.  

From when he was a child, Juan learned agricultural work thanks to his father.  He is currently planting around 7,000 square meters of corn.  

The loan that he is requesting is to buy corn, fertilizers and pesticides, since the first rains have begun to fall and he wants to be one of the first to plant.  

Juan dreams of having a good harvest of corn in order to generate sufficient income to support his family.  He also wants his children to study and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy corn, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Sonia Lorena

texts.es:
Sonia es una joven emprendedora de 23 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, actualmente está soltera y vive con su madre y tres hermanos.

Sonia se dedica a la sastrería desde hace 3 años, trabajo que aprendió de su hermana mayor lo cual le ha servido como su mayor fuente de ingresos. 

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar 2 máquinas de costura, ya que es su herramienta más importante para trabajar.

Su sueño es mejorar su negocio de sastrería y buscar a una persona para que le ayude en la elaboración de faldas, camisas, vestidos, etc.
texts.en:
Sonia is a young entrepreneur of 23. She completed secondary school. At this time she is single and lives with her mother and three siblings.

Sonia has worked in tailoring for three years, work that she learned from her older sister, who has served as her major source of income.

She is applying for this loan in order to purchase two sewing machines, since this is her most important working tool.

Her dream is to improve her tailoring business and look for a person to help her make skirts, shirts, dresses, etc.

loans.use: to buy two sewing machines, since this is her most important work tool

loans.name: Saida Lineth

texts.es: La señora Saida tiene 37 años de edad, es casada, en la actualidad no tiene hijos, ella tiene una actividad de servicios de atención en manicura y pedicura (arreglos de manos y uñas) y vende bufandas y algunas artesanías (bijou), estas actividades económicas son realizadas en un local que esta alquilado, 6 días a la semana de lunes a sábado, la señora quiere crecer en su actividad y por ello necesita capital de operación para adquirir insumos como ser esmaltes de diferentes colores, herramientas y mercaderia,  a través de estos años de trabajo ha logrado comprar un terreno con ingresos de las actividades de ella y su esposo, y ahora su siguiente objetivo es poder construir su vivienda y de esta manera mejorar sus condiciones de vida y poder proporcionar a sus hijos que vendrán en un futuro una calidad de vida mejor a la que se encuentran actualmente.
texts.en:
Saida is 37 years old, married and does not currently have children. She has a customer service business for manicures and pedicures (fixing up hands and nails) and she sells scarves and some crafts (bijou). This work is done six days a week from Monday until Saturday in a rented space. 

She wants to grow her business and for this needs operating capital to acquire supplies like different colored nail polish, tools and merchandise. Through these years of working she has managed to buy land with the income from her and her husband's jobs. 

Now, her next goal is to build a home and to in this way improve their quality of life and to provide her future children with a better quality of life than what they currently have.

loans.use: to buy nail polish, tools and merchandise to restock her business.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en: Gladys is a hardworking married woman who sells charcoal in Masindi, Uganda. She built houses to rent to boost her income generation. She has a great desire to educate her children so that they can be independent. However, she is affected by inadequate capital to buy enough stock for selling. She has requested a loan to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Gusti

texts.en: Gusti is an artisan from Indonesia who specializes in wood display dolls and carvings. He would like to invest in a purchase of raw materials, including wood and paint, and new brushes. Gusti has been selling through NOVICA since 2003. This is his story: Born to a family of farmers, Balinese artisan Gusti worked after school to ensure his education. "We were six children, so my parents could hardly invest in our education. I also took a part-time job finishing and adding color to art products. Since school, my artwork has always been admired. Once I graduated from a technical school, a friend suggested painting on a piece of wood and the result was very nice. I thoroughly enjoyed it and have been dedicated to this art form ever since. "I am happy to have a chance to get this loan--this can help me and my artisans to work to increase our inventory. I am very grateful!" Use the link below to view Gusti's wood display dolls and carvings on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/3696

loans.use: to invest in a purchase of raw materials, including wood and paint, and new brushes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand advertising efforts for her travel agency

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a veteran of the auto repair industry. He has owned other auto collision shops in the past, all of which did very well. After a brief period of exploring another career industry, he has decided to return to the field of auto body repair by opening his own business. He currently has two employees, but as his business grows, he plans to hire more. He currently supports his mother with his career.

Peter claims that his greatest success is all the contacts and valuable friendships he has made working in the auto body repair business. Good contacts and personal hard work allowed him to be hired to do official police towing for five different towns. 

The purpose of this loan is to purchase equipment for his shop and provide a cash flow cushion for emergencies. He also will use the loan to expand his business. His future vision is to improve the success and capabilities of his business and purchase his own commercial property from which to operate.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for his auto body repair shop and provide a cash flow cushion for emergencies.

loans.name: Constance

texts.en: Constance is a hardworking woman living in Masindi, Uganda. She runs a restaurant that sells both food and soft drinks. She built rental houses to generate extra income.She started the business to support her family and desires to educate her children and have a modern restaurant. Competition and inadequate capital are still great challenges. She intends to use the loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La señora tiene un hijo dependiente, su principal actividad económica es la venta de comida, ella empezó vendiendo en un puesto en el mercado, también elabora yogurt, masitas, jugos de fruta, queso y otros. Es una persona muy trabajadora empezó desde muy joven a realizar dichos trabajos y con tanto esfuerzo se compró un lote de terreno donde ahora tiene su propia pensión, en Marzo de este año la señora fue hospitalizada por un dolor extremo en la espalda que no desaparecía, y los médicos le realizaron unos exámenes de laboratorios a fondo para saber el porqué del dolor y su diagnóstico fue Obstrucción de Uréter (uropatía obstructiva unilateral aguda) por lo que debe ser intervenida quirúrgicamente lo más antes posible para restablecerse y continuar con sus actividades de manera normal, por tal motivo decidió solicitar un crédito y espera recuperarse pronto para continuar con sus actividades y ayudar a su hijo.
texts.en:
This woman has a dependent son. Her principal economic activity is selling food. She began selling at a stand in the market. She also makes yogurt, pastries, fruit juices, cheese, and other items. She is a very hard-working person. She began to do these jobs when she was very young, and with great effort she bought a plot of land where she now has her own business.

In March of this year, this woman was hospitalized for extreme pain in her back that did not go away, and the doctors performed some in-depth laboratory examinations in order to learn the cause of the pain. Their diagnosis was obstruction of the ureter (acute unilateral obstructive uropathy), for which surgical intervention is required as soon as possible so that she can recover and continue with her activities in a normal manner. For this reason, she decided to apply for a loan, and she hopes to recover soon in order to continue with her activities and help her son.

loans.use: to pay for surgery for obstruction of the ureter to improve her health.

loans.name: Liliane

texts.fr: Liliane, vit avec son mari et ses deux enfants à Rhode 2. Elle vend depuis 14 ans des produits alimentaires tels que du riz, des pates, etc. Elle s’accroche à son activité malgré le fait qu’elle ait été victime d’un vol de marchandise il y a quelques mois. Aujourd’hui, elle achète en gros pour revendre en détail. Le prêt lui permet de renouveler son stock.
texts.en: Liliane lives with her husband and her two children in Rhode 2. For fourteen years, she has been selling grocery items, such as rice, pasta, etc. She is hanging on to her business despite the fact that she was the victim of theft of merchandise a few months ago. Today, she buys in bulk to resell retail. The loan is enabling her to renew her inventory.

loans.use: to increase her inventory

loans.name: Marco

texts.en:
Marco is a 24-year-old single man, with no children. He lives with his parents, and helps them support their home. 

Marco is a carpenter's assistant, and has started to work as a taxi driver when he has free time. 

Marco is working with a customer that needs library furniture, and he needs another loan to buy more wood. He hopes you can help him again.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie has always been interested in empowering her community and worked as a Community Organizer for various projects throughout the years. She was employed in non-profits, President Barack Obama's campaign, and John Kerry's presidential campaign, among others.  In May 2001, she started her own company, Power Plus Multi Services LLC, because she wanted to help people in her community. She also wanted a secure income source for her family.

Her company offers many services such as tax services, traffic ticket services, translation services, and credit repair services. Marie enjoys offering her services to members of the community, and considers her business family- and community-oriented because she is genuinely interested in the holistic well-being of her clients. She also lends her time to provide families with free help in filing for government subsidized cell phone minutes and enrolling in health care through the insurance marketplace brought by the Affordable Care Act.  Her greatest success, she claims, has been connecting illiterate people with prospective employees. However, a lack of funds prevents her from expanding her business. 

With this loan, Marie will be able to add bill paying, money transfer, and faxing/copying services to her company. She will also use it to buy printers and additional computers. In the future, she plans to open additional locations and continue to provide valuable services to as many communities as possible.

loans.use: to add new services to her company, which helps individuals and families with their taxes, healthcare, and other paperwork

loans.name: Berthanie

texts.fr: Berthanie, veuve, vit avec ses enfants à Savanne à Palle, Hinche. Elle vend des fruits depuis 10 ans sur les marchés environnants. Le prêt lui permet de diversifier ses produits.
texts.en: Berthanie, a widow, lives with her children in Savanne, in Palle, Hinche. She has been selling fruit for ten years at nearby markets. The loan is enabling her to diversify her products.

loans.use: to diversify her products

loans.name: Visezi Group

texts.en:
Fatuma, who is in her early 30s, is married with three children, two of whom are at school and one is still small.  She has been running a gengeduka for two years now.  She works from 6am to 8pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Fatuma's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loan to increase the gengeduka stock and has paid back her loan successfully.  She used the profit to pay school fees, repay her loan and cover household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy the fast moving items in her gengeduka.  She dreams of opening another gengeduka in a different area.

Fatuma will share this loan with her loan group Visezi, which has five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy the fast moving items in her gengeduka.

loans.name: Vilma Haydee

texts.es:
Vilma de 25 años de edad, realizó sus estudios de bachillerato asistiendo a clases los fines de semana, se crió con sus padres trabajando en las artesanías de hilo como es la elaboración de hamacas y manteles, se acompañó y su pareja trabaja de mesero en un restaurante de la comunidad, tiene 3 hijos que se encuentran estudiando en la escuela.
Vilma se dedica a la crianza de especies menores como pollos de engorde, también tiene un negocio de venta de tortillas en la ciudad y viaja 30 minutos en bus para llegar al lugar donde tiene el negocio.
Ella necesita este crédito para comprar 4 sacos de maíz para elaborar tortillas y comprará concentrado para alimentar a los pollos de engorde.
Ella sueña con construir su vivienda para poder darles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida, además le gustaría hacer más grande la galera para incrementar el negocio de los pollos de engorde.
texts.en:
Vilma is 25 years old and completed her high school degree by attending classes on the weekends. She grew up with both parents working as weavers, creating hammocks and tablecloths.  She is in a relationship, and her partner works as a waiter in a local restaurant. She has 3 children who are all in school. 

Vilma raises small animals for a living, such as chickens for fattening.  She also has a business selling tortillas in the city, and she travels 30 minutes by bus to work there. 

She needs this loan to buy 4 bags of corn for tortillas, and to buy concentrated food for the fattening chickens. Vilma dreams of building her house, in order to give her children a better quality of life. She would also like to enlarge her chicken coop to grow her chicken business.

loans.use: to buy 4 bags of corn for tortillas, and to buy concentrated food for her fattening chickens

loans.name: Marie Louise

texts.fr: Marie Louise 53 ans, vit avec ses six  enfants à Bon Repos. Après s’être lancée dans de la quincaillerie, elle vend maintenant des sandales près du marché. Le prêt lui permet de diversifier ses produits.
texts.en: Marie Louise, aged 53, lives with her six children in Bon Repos. After getting started in the hardware business, she is now selling sandals near the market. The loan is enabling her to diversify her products.

loans.use: to increase her inventory

loans.name: Marie Guerline

texts.fr: Marie Guerline 44 ans, vit avec son mari et ses trois enfants à Lilavois. Elle a une boutique située tout près de sa  maison. Le crédit lui permet de diversifier encore plus ses produits afin de répondre aux besoins de la clientèle.
texts.en: Marie Guerline, aged 44, lives with her husband and her three children in Lilavois. She has a store located quite near her house. The loan is enabling her to diversify her products even more, so as to respond to customer needs.

loans.use: to diversify her products

loans.name: Jésula

texts.fr: Jésula, veuve, vend de la farine de mais, d’avoine, etc. depuis 22 ans. Son dernier prêt lui a permis d’augmenter son stock. Elle prévoit d’en faire autant pour pouvoir gagner plus de revenu.
texts.en: Jesula, a widow, has been selling maize flour, oats, etc. for the past 22 years. Her last loan enabled her to increase her stock. She plans to do so once more to generate more income.

loans.use: increase her stock of merchandise

loans.name: Rodrigo Antonio

texts.es: Rodrigo de 47 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que vive junto a su esposa y sus 3 hijos una niña de 15 años de edad que se encuentra estudiando y dos varones mayores de edad que le brindan su apoyo con los gastos de su hogar. Rodrigo presta sus servicios de seguridad desde hace varios años, actividad que le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia, tratar de brindarles lo mejor que este en sus manos. Rodrigo desea colocar un canal para el agua, ya que cuando llueve esta cae por todas partes ingresando a su vivienda, además desea mejorar el cuarto de la cocina, ya que este se encuentra deteriorado y siente que no reúne las condiciones adecuadas para preparar sus alimentos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y lámina para mejorar el cuarto de la cocina y colocar un canal de lámina para el agua.
texts.en:
Rodrigo is 47 years old. He is a hardworking man who lives with his wife and their three children: a 15-year-old girl who is currently studying and two adult boys who provide support with the household expenses. 

Rodrigo has lent his security services for several years. This business has allowed him to provide for his family and to try to provide them with the best he can get his hands on. 

Rodrigo would like to put in a gutter for the water, because when it rains, it falls everywhere, coming into his house. In addition, he would like to improve the kitchen room, as it is currently deteriorated and he feels that the conditions are not decent enough for preparing their meals. That's why he's requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick, and metal sheeting in order to improve the kitchen room and put in a metal gutter for the water.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and metal sheeting to improve the kitchen room and add a metal gutter for the water.

loans.name: Marie France

texts.fr: Marie France, 50 ans, en union libre, vend des sandales et des cravates depuis 3 ans. Le crédit lui permet de s’approvisionner régulièrement.
texts.en: 50-year-old Marie France, living in common-law union, has been selling sandals and ties for the past three years. The loan will enable her to stock up regularly.

loans.use: increase her stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to acquire an 8 m3 Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in an 8 m3 Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in a 10 m3 Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Kinasa

texts.fr:
Kinasa est une femme très créative et intelligente. Elle a 30 ans et elle est mariée. Son mari est tireur de charrette. Le revenu est instable et aléatoire.
L'activité qu'elle effectue est un peu spéciale ou disons-même extraordinaire. Elle revête des poupées à l'occasion et elle les revend après. D'abord, elle achète chez les brocantes des pièces détachées des poupées ous des poupées déjà usées. Ensuite, elle fait les assemblages et des petites reparations. Et enfin, elle crée le modèle, coupe et coude les robettes et revête les poupées avant de les vendre. Cela fait 8 ans qu'elle est dans cette activité et elle se debrouille bien, elle est très impliquée et passionnée.
Son désir de réussir et d'offrir une meilleur qualité de vie à ses enfants la pousse à travailler dur. Elle a trois filles et un garçon.
texts.en: Kinasa is a very creative and intelligent women. She is 30 years old and married. Her husband pulls a cart, though the income is unstable and sporadic. Kinasa’s business is a little special, let’s say even extraordinary. She dresses used dolls and sells them. First she buys parts of dolls or secondhand dolls from flea markets. Then she assembles them and makes small repairs. Finally, she creates a pattern, cuts, and sews the little outfits and dresses the dolls before selling the dolls. She has been doing this work for eight years, and she done well figuring it all out. She is very involved and impassioned. Her wish is to success and to provide an excellent quality of life for her children drives her to work hard. She has three girls and a boy.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, thread, lace, ribbon, and spare parts for dolls

loans.name: April Sarah

texts.en:
April Sarah is 30 years old and married. She lives in Pagadian, Philippines. April Sarah has been venturing in a RTW (ready-to-wear clothing) business to support her family. 

April Sarah is requesting a 9,000 PHP loan to purchase RTW stock for her business venture. In the future, she hopes to have an area to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase RTW (ready-to-wear clothing) stock for her business venture

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn has ventured into food vending as a business in Pagadian, Zamboanga del Sur. This has been doing well in supporting the needs of the family. 

Recently, she borrowed an amount to purchase more kilos of meat and spices. She wants to expand her business and would be more than happy to open a small canteen at a nearby school.

loans.use: to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her food-vending business

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 65 years old and residing at Pagadian, Philippines. She is married and blessed with five children. She joined PMPC in 2010 in order to access the programs and services of the said co-op. 

Recently, she's accessing a loan in the amount of PHP 14,900 for additional working capital of her existing business to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. She is selling a variety of food products in the local community.

loans.use: to restock the store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: H. Nadia Michelle

texts.fr:
Nadia Michelle est une couturière de formation et certifiée. Elle avait renforcé sa connaissance en couture chez CEFOR même dans le volet formation professionnelle. Puis , elle empruntait dans le volet micro finance  pour l’investissement. Elle possède actuellement 3 machines à coudre: 2 piqueuses, 1 surjeteuse. Et elle souhaite même pouvoir construire une petite entreprise et créer des emplois.
Elle est mariée et son mari est cordonnier et qui travaille pour son propre compte. Il a motivé Nadia Michelle à mettre en pratique sa connaissance  pour l'aider à soutenir la famille.
Ils on deux enfants qui ont 23 et 20 ans. Le premier est déjà marié et n'est plus à leur charge mais le second suit encore ses études dans une université privée. Ce dernier a encore besoin du soutien de ses parents surtout financièrement pour la préparation de son thèse et mémoire.
texts.en:
Nadia Michelle is a trained and certified seamstress. She had strengthened her knowledge of sewing at CEFOR, even to the professional level. Then she took microfinance investment training. She currently owns three sewing machines: two lockstitch and one overlock. And her wish is even to be able to build a small enterprise and to create jobs. 

Nadia Michelle is married and her husband is a shoemaker working on his own. He has motivated her to put her knowledge to work to help support the family. They have two children, aged 23 and 20. The older one is already married and no longer in their care. But the younger is still in school at a private university; he still needs support from his parents, especially financially, in preparation for his thesis and dissertation.

loans.use: to purchase different kinds of fabrics, thread, buttons, elastic, lace, ribbon, etc. ...

loans.name: Sanita

texts.en: Sanita learned about Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance it extends. After several months, she was able to return her borrowed capital. Sanita feels she owes her good fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used for her business. Recently, she availed a loan to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer for the next cropping season. Sanita wishes to sustain her business and be able to supply corn in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Hermeniana

texts.en:
Hermeniana landed at a right place for her needed capital when she joined PMPC. She knew this would be her last chance to get back on her feet when she went broke after her first business went bad. PMPC to Hermeniana came as a rescue for lending her money when she needed it the most. 

Now, she took another loan for the next cropping season. She borrowed an amount for land and seedbed preparation. Hermeniana perseveres and always believes in reaching for her goal to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in brick, cement, sand, gravel and iron to build her home as soon as possible.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is a mother of two small children and has invested in a dry goods and RTW (ready-to-wear clothing) business. She does this work to support her children. 

She asked for a loan to purchase stock of dry goods and RTW. Increasing her stock will lead her to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of dry goods and RTW (ready-to-wear clothing)

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy has a fruit stand to support her two children. She used her loan to increase her inventories of fruit stock. 

She is now on her way to repaying the loan with her new profits and dreamed of expanding the area of her business.

loans.use: To increase her inventories of fruit stock

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Gliceria

texts.en:
Gliceria is a plain housewife. She busies herself caring for her ornamental plants and earns a meager income from her hobby. 

Now she plans to utilize her space, starting a little store and earning additional income, enabling her to meet her family's needs. She joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and develop her skill in business engagements. 

Gliceria is requesting a loan of 6,000 Philippines Pesos (PHP), which will be used to buy more assorted goods for her store.

loans.use: to buy more assorted goods for her store

loans.name: Ingri Senaida

texts.es:
Ingri de 26 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, actualmente está soltera y vive con su madre y 4 hermanos.

Ingri tiene 3 años de experiencia en la elaboración de faldas, vestidos, camisas, ella tomó un curso de capacitación de cortes y confecciones y fue así como aprendió este trabajo que ahora le está sirviendo de mucho.

Ella esta solicitando este crédito para comprar dos máquinas de costura y tela para elaborar ropa.

Su sueño es seguir creciendo en el negocio para tener mejor calidad de costura y darle un buen servicio a los clientes.
texts.en:
Ingri is 26 years old and studied until high school. She is currently single and lives with her mother and four siblings. 

Ingri has four years of experience making skirts, dresses and shirts. She took a training course on sewing and cutting. That was how she learned this work that is now serving her well. 

She is requesting this loan to buy two sewing machines and thread to make clothing. 

Her dreams are to continue growing the business to have better quality needlework and to give good service to her customers.

loans.use: to buy two sewing machines and thread to make clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in a 6 m3 Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Vola Hanitra

texts.fr:
Agée de 25 ans, Vola Hanitra tient un magasin général depuis 2010. Mais même long temps avant cette année, elle avait déjà aidé sa mère à diriger le sien. Ce qui fait qu'elle en possède donc tant d'années d'expérience en la matière. Elle veut développer et étendre son affaire actuellement, elle veut ouvrir d'autres points de vente. 
Vola Hanitra est mariée et son mari est marchand de légumes ( plus précisément de pommes de terre) et elle a deux adorables petits enfants de 3 et 2 ans
texts.en: Vola Hanitra, aged 25, has had a general store since 2010. But even a long time before that, she had already helped her mother to manage hers. So she has had so many years of experience in this area. She wants to develop and expand her current business. She wants to open more sales outlets. Vola Hanitra is married and her husband is a vegetables merchant (potatoes, to be exact). And she has two adorable children, aged 2 and 3 years old.

loans.use: to purchase nail polish, headbands, and pince-crabes, etc.....

loans.name: Rustambek

texts.ru:
Рустамбек счастливый отец двоих детей и верный муж. Его жена работает на колхозе, а он сам работает на рынке. У него имеется не большая торговая точка, где продает линолеумы и кленки. В выходные дни он помогает своей жене в сельскохозяйственной деятельности. 
   Рустамбек хочет расширить деятельность, чтобы накопить денег на образование детей. Он планирует привезти большой объем товара, так как на его товар имеется спрос. Из-за нехватки финансовых средств Рустамбек обратился за кредитом. На пути этого джентльмена стоит только не большая нехватка средств, и он уверен, что это не преграда, потому что найдутся люди, которые его поддержат.
texts.en:
Rustambek is a happy father of two children and a faithful husband.  His wife works on a state farm and Rustambek works at a market.  He has a large stall where he sells linoleum and oilcloth.  On his days off, Rustambek helps his wife with her farm work.  

Rustambek wants to expand his business in order to save up money for his children's educations.  He plans to bring in a large volume of goods since they enjoy strong demand.  He has applied for a loan due to a lack of funds.  All that stands in this gentleman's way is a minor lack of funds.  Rustambek is confident that this isn't an obstacle because he will find people who will support him.

loans.use: to buy linoleum and oilcloth

loans.name: Euphrasie

texts.fr:
Euphrasie a 33ans, elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants de 16, 13 et 10 ans. Ses enfants vont tous actuellement à l'école.
Auparavant, elle travaillait pendant long temps dans une entreprise de zone franche et elle avait pu économiser beaucoup d'argent. Et en 2011, quand l'entreprise avait dû fermer, elle a démarré une petite épicerie avec son économie. C'est une femme très prévoyante et débrouillarde. Avec ses efforts personnels et le coup de pouce de CEFOR, la petite épicerie est devenue magasin général actuellement.
En ce moment, elle voudrait encore développer davantage son affaire et elle demande un prêt pour y parvenir, elle voudrait augmenter son revenu. De plus , elle a déjà négocié avec le propriétaire de la maison où elle habite et du local de son magasin qu'elle va les acheter. Le local est en bon emplacement.
texts.en:
Euphrasie, aged 33, is a married mother of three children, aged 16, 13, and 10. Her children are all currently in school. In the past, Euphrasie worked for a long time in an enterprise in the free zone. She was able to save a lot of money. In 2011, when the enterprise had to close, she began a small grocery store with her savings. She is a woman who is far-sighted and a problem-solver. 

With her personal efforts and a helping hand from CEFOR, the small grocery store became the general store that it is today. Now, she would like to develop her business further, and she is asking for a loan to achieve this. She would like to increase her income. In addition, she has already negotiated with the owner of the house in which she lives and the spot for her store to buy them. The store is in a good location.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies, canned drinks, rice, soap, cookies, and candies

loans.name: Margarethe

texts.fr: Margarethe 30 ans, vit avec son mari et son enfant à Canaan. Elle vend  des produits alimentaires sur un petit marché de la zone. Elle a décidé de contracter ce prêt pour pouvoir augmenter son stock et gagner plus de revenus.
texts.en:
30-year-old Margarethe lives with her husband and child in Canaan. She sells food products in a small local market.

She decided to request this loan to increase her stock supply and generate more income.

loans.use: increase her stock

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.en:
Guadalupe is from Liloy, Philippines. She is married and has four children. Guadalupe joined PMPC, and she appreciates the programs and services of the co-op. 

Guadalupe has a retailing business selling various commodities, helping the family survive. Fortunately, she makes promising sales every day and is able to save from it. Guadalupe keeps on running the business well to continuously provide for her family. She believes that with their support, they will keep going and sustain the business. 

Guadalupe wishes to have safe and comfortable living quarters with a house constructed with a durable ceiling and walls. She has applied for a loan of 19,000 Philippines Pesos (PHP) to buy additional construction materials for the completion of her house, like bags of cement and roof sheet. 

Guadalupe wants nothing more than to live a happy and healthy life with her family.

loans.use: to buy additional construction materials for the completion of her house, like bags of cement and roof sheet

loans.name: Magaly

texts.fr: Magaly, 43 ans, en union libre, est mère de deux enfants. Elle vend des produits alimentaires depuis plus de 5 ans. Son dernier prêt lui a permis de diversifier ses produits pour attirer d’autres clients.
texts.en: Magaly, aged 43 and in a common-law marriage, is the mother of two children. She has been selling grocery items for over five years. Her last loan enabled her to diversify her products in order to attract more customers.

loans.use: to diversify her products

loans.name: Anselma

texts.en:
She is an industrious woman, who supports her family by making native baskets. Her name is Anselma. She is 44 years of age, with seven children. Her oldest child is 24, and the youngest is 5. She lives in Balilihan, Bohol. Her husband is a farmer.

Anselma is asking for a loan to buy additional materials like nito (palm), wicker (pliable twigs), bamboo strips and a knife. These resources are essentials in weaving more baskets to be delivered to her respective customers. With these, her income will improve, and she will be able to balance her finances. Thus, she could also provide for the needs of her growing children.

She hopes that her basket weaving business will be productive to be able to finance the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like nito (palm), wicker (pliable twigs), bamboo strips and a knife

loans.name: Prevener

texts.fr: Prevener, 36 ans, en union libre, a un enfant. Il possède une petite quincaillerie depuis 12 ans ou il vend principalement tout produit pour l’entretien des véhicules. Le crédit lui permet de diversifier ses produits.
texts.en: Prevener, 36 years old and in a common-law marriage, has one child. He has owned a small hardware business for twelve years where he mainly sells any product for maintaining vehicles. The loan is enabling him to diversify his products.

loans.use: to diversify his products

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida finds pleasure in doing her gardening activities. Not only is she doing her hobby, she earns an income as well. At the age of 60 and married, she busies herself to sufficiently provide for the family. 

She grabbed the opportunity to become a full pledge member of PMPC. She credits to the cooperative her capital in supporting her gardening activities. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to pay for seedlings and compost. In the future, Leonida wishes to become the supplier in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to pay for seedlings and compost

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to diversify her products

loans.name: Zafar

texts.ru: 34 летный мужчина Зафар. Он из города Душанбе. Зафар женат и имеет детей. Жена домохозяйка. Дети учатся в средней школе.  Сам Зафар занимается перевозом товаров. Он перевозить алебастр, цемент,  шпаклевка и другие стройматериалы для клиентов. У него есть помещения, где он продает строительные средств, и имеет собственный  грузовик, который с помощью его он перевозит товар клиентов. Зафар обратился за кредитом,  и за счет кредита он закажет больше алебастр, цемент и другие строительные принадлежности на продажу и расширить бизнес. Он очень нуждается на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Zafar is a 34 year old man who lives in Dushanbe.  He is married and has children.  Zafar's wife is a homemaker and his children are in school.  Zafar is in the transport business.  He transports plaster, cement, spackle and other building materials.  He also has a store where he sells building materials and he has his own cargo vehicle, with which he delivers his clients' goods.

Zafar has applied for a loan in order expand his business by placing a large order for plaster, cement and other building materials to sell.  Zafar very much needs your support.

loans.use: to expand his business

loans.name: Abelle Sylvie

texts.fr:
Agée de 38 ans, mariée et mère de trois enfants, Abelle Sylvie est une femme travailleuse et dynamique. Ses enfants sont âgés respectivement de 15, 9 et 7 ans et ils vont tous actuellement à l'école. La famille habite ensemble dans une maison à location et envisage de ce fait d'acheter un terrain et de construire sa propre maison. C'est l'objectif à long terme.
Concernant l'activité génératrice de revenu de la famille, les deux époux exploitent ensemble un petit commerce de sous-vêtement (slips dames et hommes) et ceci depuis leur union. Le prêt va leur permettre d'améliorer et de développer l'activité. Elle voudrait augmenter  les quantités des articles et les diversifier(en modèle et en pointure).
La plus importante pour elle c'est le bien-être de ses enfants; leurs éducations et leurs avenir. Ce sont eux qui la motive à travailler dur infatigablement.
texts.en:
Abelle Sylvie, aged 38, is a married mother of three. She is a hard-working and energetic woman. Her children are respectively 15, 9, and 7 years old, and they all are currently attending school. The family lives together in a rented house and so envisions buying a plot of land on which to build a house. The goal is a longterm one. 

Concerning the revenue-generating business of the family, the couple have been jointly selling undergarments (for women and men) since they were married. The loan is going to enable them to improve and develop the business. 

Abelle Sylvie would like to increase the number of items and diversify them (models and sizes). The most important thing for her is her children’s well-being, education, and future. They are the ones who motivate her to work hard and tirelessly.

loans.use: to purchase undergarments

loans.name: Martine

texts.fr:
Martine est une femme travailleuse infatigable. A 51 ans, elle exerce encore avec son mari plusieurs activités sources de revenu. Elle est dans plusieurs secteurs: fabrication, commerce, et agricole: fabrication des briques, vente des briques, des sables et gravillons, élevage porcin.
Cette fois-ci, la demande de prêt est orienté dans l'élevage, elle voudrait le développer car d'ici deux mois sera le moment de "famadihana", us et coutume malagasy pendant lequel, les commandes de viandes seront absolument en hausse. Et elle prévoie déjà dès maintenant l'opportunité.
Martine a 5 enfants qui sont tous déjà grands et indépendants.Mais quand bien-même avec son travail acharné, elle veut assurer une solide retraite.  Elle possède une maison, mais souhaite encore construire une autre
texts.en:
Martine is a tireless working woman. At 51, she still shares with her husband several sources of income-generating activities, in different sectors (manufacturing, commerce, and agriculture): making bricks and selling bricks, sand and gravel, and pig farming.

This time, the loan application is oriented towards breeding, which is what she wants to focus on over the next two months until the time of "famadihana", a Malagasy custom during which orders for meat will significantly increase. She is now already anticipating this opportunity.

Martine has five children who are already grown and independent. But even though she works hard, she wants to ensure a solid retirement income. She owns a house, but would like to build another one.

loans.use: buy five pigs and bags of feed

loans.name: Ulezi Group

texts.en:
Amina, who is in her late 40s, is married with four children, who are still in school. She has been running a beauty salon for 5 years. She works from 8am to 9pm daily, and is able to make a good monthly profit.
 
This will be Amina's 10th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to renovate her salon by painting the shop, and bought a dryer and  salon products. Amina has paid back all her loans successfully. She is happy with the loan, and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group. She used the profit to pay school fees, repay her loans, and finish building her house.  

Amina will use this loan to buy up-to-date salon equipment to meet her customers’ requirements and requests. She dreams of starting a business selling chips.

Amina will share this loan with her loan group, Ulezi, which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy up-to-date salon equipment to meet her customers’ requirements and requests

loans.name: Jocknous

texts.en:
Jocknous is a 31-year-old single, hardworking man. He has no children, and lives in Kasese, Uganda. 

He has been in the agriculture business for three years, plus teaching in a local school for additional income. He is a man who loves his profession, and is working hard to upgrade his studies. 

Jocknous has managed to set up a general merchandise shop out of his agriculture profits, achieving part of his vision. He is not married because he prefers to complete his studies first, even though low salaries and price fluctuations affect his business income. 

Jocknous says his vision is to become a head master in a grade one primary school in his area. 

He is requesting a loan to buy sugar, salt and other general merchandise to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, and other general merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Maria Lidia

texts.es:
María, sigue trabajando en el fortalecimiento de la granja de pollos de engorde y necesita de un nuevo crédito que utilizará básicamente para comprar pollos recién nacidos, concentrado y vitaminas, tendrá oportunidad de cuidar mejor de sus animales y de atender a nuevos clientes.
La ayuda que los financiamientos le dan a María le permiten seguir trabajando y dar a su familia nuevas condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
María continues working to grow her fryer chicken farm and she needs a new loan, which she will use to buy newly hatched chicks, feed, and vitamins. She will have the opportunity to better care for her animals and to tend to new clients.

The help that the loans provide María allow her to continue working and giving her family new living conditions.

loans.use: to buy newly hatched chicks, feed, and vitamins.

loans.name: Rabiya

texts.ru: Рабия,50 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Рабия занимается животноводством, стартовав 5 лет назад, с покупки скота на 30,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Рабии, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: овца и 2 коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет в среднем 24,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Рабия обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Рабия планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Rabiya is 50 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  Rabiya has a secondary education.  Her family's primary income is from the animal husbandry business Rabiya started five years ago with the purchase of 30,000 som (KGS) worth of cattle.  As a result of Rabiya's hard work, today she has a sheep and two cows.  Her monthly income averages 24,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to developing her business further, Rabiya has applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle in order to increase the size of her herd.  Rabiya plans to invest the profits from the loan in further increasing the size of her herd of cattle.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase basic supplies  (rice, sugar, cooking oil), flour, pasta, cookies, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mobile phones and phone accessories (kits, batteries, chargers).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more stock of vegetables and tomatoes for sale in the market, so as to meet her client's needs, and those of her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy potatoes, flours, oils, coal, and pistachios.

loans.name: Christine

texts.fr:
Christine est une femme très dynamique et aussi sociable. Et elle a une bonne attitude commerciale. Elle est depuis très long temps dans le secteur commerce, mais seulement, ce sont les articles qu'elle vend qui changent de temps à autre suivant la saison et les circonstances. En ce moment où on est complètement en hiver, les marchandises sont des couvertures , des blousons, et des pullovers friperie.
Elle demande un crédit pour augmenter la quantité et diversifier les articles. Et notons que les clients préfèrent les articles de bonne occasions, le pouvoir d' achat après la crise ne leurs permet pas d’acquérir des neufs.
Christine a 47 ans et elle est mariée. Son mari est réparateur de bicyclette. Elle a 4 enfants dont les deux premiers 27 et 25 ans sont déjà mariés et les deux derniers de 15 t 13 ans sont encore à sa charge et scolarisés.
texts.en:
Christine is a very dynamic and sociable woman, with a good business attitude. She has been active for a very long time in the trade sector, but only the products she sells change from time to time depending on the season and circumstances. In this winter-time, the goods are second-hand blankets, jackets, and sweaters.

She is requesting a loan to increase the quantity and diversity of her products. Do note that customers prefer quality used goods, as their purchasing power following the political crisis does not allow them to acquire new articles.

Christine is 47 years old and married. Her husband is a bicycle repairman. She has four children, the first two, 25 and 27 years of age, are already married and the last two, 15 and 13 years old, are still dependents and in school.

loans.use: buy a bale of blankets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more animals and to repair and build corrals.

loans.name: Veromanitra Tiana

texts.fr:
Agée de 42 ans, Veromanitra Tiana est mariée et mère de trois enfants de 15,12 et 7 ans qui sont tous maintenant scolarisés.
Son activité principale génératrice de revenu , objet de sa demande de crédit est la vente de friperie. Les articles sont spécialement pour enfants et bébés. Son mari est avec elle dans l'exercice de cette activité. Il effectue de marchand ambulant et se déplace jusqu'en province pour vendre les vêtements. Ils sont dans cette affaire depuis 9 ans. Mais à part la friperie, elle est agent immobilier. C'est une femme débrouillarde et très active.
Son objectif est de pouvoir offrir à ses enfants une meilleur condition de vie, une meilleur éducation. Elle voudrait les voir réussir dans leurs études afin d'avoir du brillant avenir.
texts.en:
Fourty-two years old, Veromanitra Tiana is married and a mother of three children, ages 15, 12, and 7, all in school.

Her main revenue-making activity, cloths resale, is the reason for her loan request. The cloths she sells are especially for children and babies. 

Her husband works with her in this business. He works walking around the market and making sales out in the countryside. They have been in this business for nine years. In addition to the cloths business, she is also a real estate agent. She is a very resourceful and active woman.

Her goal is to be able to offer to her children a better standard of living and a better education. She would like to see them succeed in their studies in order to have a brilliant future.

loans.use: to buy pants, sweaters, jackets, sleep suits, and socks.

loans.name: Joséphine

texts.fr:
Veuve de 49 ans, Joséphine est une femme active et créative. Pour assurer déjà de son futur et de sa vieillesse, elle exerce depuis 9 ans une activité génératrice de revenu qui la passionne vraiment. Elle fabrique différents modèles de bracelets avec des faux perles et des peaux tannés et les vend après. Elle vend aussi des sacs dames et de porte-monnaies. Elle ne reçoit d'aucune aide financière de la part de ses quatre  enfants qui sont déjà mariés et elle n'en veut même pas tant qu'elle peut encore travailler.
Son désire est de pouvoir épargner davantage, continuer à travailler et avancer avec ses propres efforts pour la sécurité de son futur.
texts.en:
Widow of 49 years, Joséphine is an active and creative woman. To secure her future and her old age, for 9 years, she has been managing a business that she is truly passionate about. She makes different types of bracelets with costume pearls and leathers, then sells them. She also sells handbags and coin-purses. She does not receive any financial help from any of her four children, who are already married, and she wouldn't even want it because she can still work. 

Her desire is to be able to save up more, to continue to work, and to advance by her own efforts to ensure her future.

loans.use: to buy ribbons, costume pearls, tanned leathers, bags, and coin-purses.

loans.name: Mary Carmen

texts.es: Mary de 26 años de edad, inició su microempresa de calzado en compañía de su cónyuge hace seis años, fabrican y comercializan sus productos a clientes del sector, los cuales exhibe desde su vivienda ubicada en un barrio en el sur de Barranquilla, donde cada 15 días sus clientes pueden escoger el calzado según su preferencia, recibir sus encargos y ver la nueva colección a partir de las 4 p.m. hasta las 7 p.m. Esta actividad la aprendió cuando trabajaba en la zapatería de una amiga donde adquirió todo la experiencia necesaria para arriesgarse y asumir el reto.   El éxito del negocio se debe en gran medida a su experiencia comercial, ella estuvo dedicada varios años a la venta de productos cárnicos, productos de aseo e incluso ropa; en la actualidad continúa ofreciendo ropa alterno a su microempresa de calzado.  Mary está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar materia prima; cuero, suela, forros, pegante, tintas entre otros productos necesarios para la producción.   Considera que con esta inversión incrementará las ventas y con ello sus utilidades.  Mary es madre de dos niños menores de edad a quienes desea continuar ofreciendo bienestar, su meta familiar es comprar su casa y que su negocio sea cada día más estable.
texts.en:
Mary, 26 years old, started her small shoe business with her spouse six years ago. They make and sell their products to customers in the area. She exhibits these in her home located in a neighborhood in the south of the Barranquilla. Here, customers can choose their shoe every 15 days, according to preference, pick up their orders and view the new collection starting from 4pm until 7pm. 

She learned this business when she worked in the shoe factory of a friend where she acquired all the necessary experience to take the risk and assume the challenge. 

A large part of the success of the business is due to her commercial experience. She worked for many years selling meat and cleaning products and clothes. Currently, she continues offering alternative clothing at her small shoe business. 

Mary is requesting a crediKiva, the first loan made with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, to buy raw materials: leather, soles, lining, glue and dye among other products necessary for production. 

She believes this investment will increase sales and with that, her earnings. Mary is the mother of two young children to whom she wishes to continue providing for their well being. Her family goal is to buy a home and for her business to become more stable each day.

loans.use: to buy raw materials: leather, soles, lining, glue and dye among other products necessary for production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow to increase milk production in order to meet clients' milk supply needs.

loans.name: Wassim

texts.en:
Wassim is a 26-year-old single man who has been providing transportation services since 2013. He owns a bus which he drives happily providing transportation services in his region. Wassim also uses the bus to meet the transportation needs of tourists.
