This provides additional income for his business enabling him to progress towards properly developing his current business career.

As a step forward towards developing his business, Wassim is taking out a Youth loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to continue building his private bus parking area over which, in the future, he will build his dream house.

Wassim hopes that in the future he can buy another bus and widely expand the sector in which he works.

loans.use: To continue building his private bus parking area

loans.name: Paciencia

texts.en:
Paciencia engages in making and selling native baskets. She lives in Balilihan, Bohol. She is married with four grown children. She has been engaged in weaving baskets for more than 10 years. She needs funds to finance her ongoing livelihood.

She is asking for a loan to buy materials like bamboo strips, nito (palm), and wicker (pliable twigs). With these, she will be able to produce more baskets and deliver them to her respective customers. These will enable Paciencia to augment her income and be able to do some business expansion.

In the future, she hopes that with the additional capital she borrows, she will be successful in handling her business to improve the living condition of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials like bamboo strips, nito (palm), and wicker (pliable twigs).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy dairy feed for her dairy cows to produce more milk to sell

loans.name: Mageline

texts.en:
Mageline is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Mageline is 61 years old and has children who are in school.

Mageline has a bread retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more bread to sell.

Mageline has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bread to sell

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is 49 years old and married with two children who are both in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Adelaida runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Adelaida has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap and other groceries.

In the future Adelaida would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Charmagne

texts.en:
Charmagne is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 37 years old and has three children who are in school.

Charmagne has a manicure business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy new tools and equipment for her manicure business.

Charmagne has been in this business for six years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her manicure business.

loans.name: Annalyn

texts.en:
Annalyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 35 years old and has three children who are in school.

Annalyn has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stock of groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for three years. In the future, Annalyn would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline hails from Tagbilaran City, Bohol. She operates a sari-sari (variety) store, selling various goods including biscuits, chips, bread, seasonings, condiments, beverages, soft drinks and toiletries. She has been operating a sari-sari (variety) store for two years now. She has three dependents ages 10, 15 and 18 years old respectively.

She is asking for a loan to purchase assorted groceries and soft drinks. These items will fill her store and enable more customers to shop. Thus, she could have a variety on display and improve her income. Slowly, Evangeline will be able to handle her finances and settle her obligations.

Evangeline is determined to expand her business and with proper management it would become productive and able to support the needs of her growing children in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase assorted groceries and soft drinks

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.en:
Nilufar was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1994 and lives in the district with her family. She is single and lives with her parents who are workers. The money they earn is spent on everyday family needs such as food and clothing. 

Nilufar is a student at university and studies with excellence. She is well known among students and friends and is a generous girl. Nilufar wants to be educated and to be a specialist to help in social change which is the area of her major. She has requested a loan from IMON and Kiva lenders to pay her university tuition fee. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition fee

loans.name: Jonas

texts.en:
Jonas, who is in his early 50s, is married with two children, a girl and a boy, who are still at school. He has been selling agricultural products for ten years now. He works from 8 am to 5 pm daily and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be Jonas’s tenth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to expand his business, which is now serving more people. He paid back his loan very well. He used the profit to cover house expenses and pay school fees and the loan repayment. He will use this loan to increase his stock of agricultural equipment to resell. He dreams of expanding his business and opening a new branch.

loans.use: to increase his stock of agricultural equipment to resell.

loans.name: Carmelina Rosa

texts.es: Palabras sobran para esta gigante y admirable mujer, ella a pesar de tener una enfermedad, de ser madre de 3 hijos dos mujeres de 7 y 3 y un hombre de 5 se la rebusca para alimentarlos y protegerlos, ella vende alimentos, usa la cocina y los pocos implementos que tiene, gracias a estos ingresos logra darles un buen alimento a sus muchachos y pagar el estudio para que se eduquen y aspiren a una buena vida, Carmelina una mujer que supero grandes adversidades hoy sonríe porque con la ayuda de un préstamo que se encuentra solicitando podrá comprar las ollas que tanto necesita para aumentar su producción y generar más ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: There are many words for this big and admirable woman.  Despite her being sick and being the mother of two daughters, ages 7 and 3 and a five year old boy, she sells food out of her kitchen so she can support them.  She uses her kitchen and the few implements she has, thanks to her income she is able to feed her children and pay for their education.  Carmelina overcame great adversities and is smiling because the money from the loan she is requesting will help her buy the pots she desperately needs to increase her production and generate more income to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more retail stock to sell in the area for more income gain.

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Diego es de la ciudad de Ybycuí, sigue con sus estudios en administración de empresas, y comenta que por medio de sus estudios esta poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder ser alguien en la vida. Comenta que por medio de su anterior préstamo pudo pagar las cuotas de su carrera lo que le fue de mucha ayuda.
Pide este nuevo préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, y con ello poder cubrir ese gasto que tiene. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Diego is from Ybycuí and continues studying company management and says that he is putting forth effort to be someone in life.  He says that he was able to pay tuition with his previous loan, which was very helpful.

He is asking for this new loan to cover tuition.  He is grateful for this opportunity to continue his education.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
For two years now, Gemma has engaged in raising and selling hogs. She resides in Sikatuna, Bohol. She is 26 years old with a four-year-old son. Her husband earns a living by being a carpenter.

Gemma has requested a loan in the amount of 8,000 PHP to purchase piglets, feed, and pig supplements. With these, she could be able to raise quality pigs which can be sold at a higher price. In the coming months, Gemma's income will be able to augment and start to balance her finances. Thus, she could be able to provide her children with nutritious diets and continue to send them to school.

She dreams of expanding her business to make it productive and profitable.

loans.use: to purchase piglets, feed, and pig supplements.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 32 years old, from Badian, Cebu. She works hard for her family because her husband, who does welding work, is not earning enough for them. With five children ages one to seven, Marilou learned to engage in the food vending business selling noodles, soup, sautéed vegetables and mongo beans, and fried foods. She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients such as soy sauce, noodles, vegetables, fish and seasonings.

Marilou is eager to learn so she can make her business more successful and increase profitability.

loans.use: to buy soy sauce, noodles, vegetables, fish and seasonings.

loans.name: Estelita

texts.en:
Estelita is an entrepreneur and a hardworking woman with two children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

She supplements this income with earnings from her general store.

Estelita dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Idrissa

texts.en:
This is 40 year-old Idrissa.  He is married, and has 3 children aged 7, 4 and 2 years, 2 are school going children. He has 3 additional dependents, who live with him to be fostered.  In 2012, Idrissa established his drinks business.  Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about SLL 2,700,000 every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. Idrissa has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase crates of assorted drinks. In the future, Idrissa plans to complete his building project, reinvest and expand his business. He bought 1 and half plot of land, a refrigerator for cooling his drinks for his business as previously planned.   He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase crates of assorted drinks to expand his business

loans.name: Abdul

texts.en:
This is 32 year-old Abdul.  He is single, and has 2 children aged 11 and 4 years, 1 is a school going child. He has 1 additional dependent, who live with him to be fostered.  In 2013, Abdul established his Hard and Soft drinks business.  Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about SLL 3,000,000 every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 6,000,000. Abdul has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase crates of assorted drinks. In the future, Abdul plans to open another outlet, reinvest and expand his business. His major challenge is lack of adequate drinks.  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase crates of assorted drinks so as to open another outlet in the future

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en:
Alphonsine is 52 years old. She is married with 4 children aged between 13 and 24 years, They all go to school. She is a farmer and she has been growing maize for the past 3 years. Her husband is also a farmer. With the loan from Kiva, she would like to pay workers who harvested maize. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees of her children and to improve her standards of living.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos es un perro viejo de la zona un hombre que oferta los servicios de mecánica para carros y motos que inicio su vida como independiente persiguen un sueño comprar una vivienda propia, ese anhelo que lo trasnocha y que lo hace levantarse a dar lo mejor de sí para cumplirlo y se siente muy feliz porque en su profesión encontró felicidad y sostenimiento.

Juan Carlos se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de repuesto para moto, llantas, compra de herramienta y equipo para su taller.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is an old dog in the area.  He is a man who provides auto and motorcycle mechanic services.  This started his life of independence and his dream of buying a home of his own.  This desire motivates him to rise up to complete it and he is very happy because he has found happiness and sustainment in his profession.

Juan Carlos is asking for a loan to buy motorcycle spare parts, tires, tools, and shop equipment.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies.

loans.name: Wellington

texts.en:
Wellington is a smallholder farmer from Kanyakine village in Kenya who raises pigs, rabbits and a dairy cow on a one acre property. Wellington lives with his wife and 2 children. His children are all in boarding schools. Wellington has been farming for as long as he has been married - 18 years. 

Wellington is seeking a loan of KES 20,000 to buy a water tank and water pipes. His farm is situated near a river where he gets his water. Having a water tank will help him irrigate his land more easily and effectively. The tank will also ensure constant availability of drinking water for his farm animals. 

With your investment, Wellington’s family will enjoy having greener grass and crops, and healthier animals.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and pipes for irrigation of his land and to be able to provide drinking water to the animals

loans.name: Nury

texts.es:
Nury vive una relación libre, tiene su pareja pero no están comprometidos, es madre de 3 hijos adolescentes que depende de ella, solo el mayor tiene trabajo pero vive bajo su caloroso manto.

Nury es madre pero igualmente una comerciante y excelente vendedora, tiene una tienda de abarrotes que fundo pro necesidad económica y que hoy gracias a este negocio puede gozar de una buena calidad de vida.

Nury quiere seguir por el camino del éxito, surtir su negocio, en el momento se encuentra solicitando un apoyo financiero para la compra de abarrotes y granos con el fin de abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Nury is in a live in relationship and is the mother of three teen-aged children who depend on her for support; only the oldest works.  Nury is a mother but also a merchant and an excellent salesperson.  She has a grocery store that she founded out of financial need and thanks to this business she is able to enjoy a good quality of life.

Nury wants to continue on the path of success and stock her business.  At the moment she is asking for a loan to buy groceries and grains so she can stock her store.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Gloria Amparo

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer soltera, ella depende únicamente de sus capacidades como cocinera para ganar el sustento para su hogar, tiene un negocio de venta de alimentos, como panes, pasteles, frituras en papa, refrescos que inicio ene l año 2014 como una salida al desempleado y tratando de alcanzar ese gran sueño de tener una vivienda propia. 

Gloria se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de surtido como refrescos, frituras papas y pasteles congelados, como lleva poco tiempo de iniciar necesita del capital para consolidarse y hacerse notar en el barrio.
texts.en:
Gloria is a single woman who depends only on her capabilities as a cook to support her household.  She sells food such as bread, cake, and fried potatoes, and started in 2014 after being unemployed and trying to reach her goal of having a home of her own.

Gloria is asking for this loan to buy items such as soft drinks, potatoes, and frozen cakes.  Since she recently started, she needs a loan to set up and become known in the neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Louise

texts.fr:
Louise est une mère de famille à la fois consciencieuse, courageuse et travailleuse. Elle est divorcée, son mari l'a quitté avec leurs six enfants il y a maintenant cinq ans. C'était un ivrogne et ne participait jamais au bon fonctionnement du ménage. Elle dit qu'elle est un peu soulagée de son départ parce que c'était un charge de plus.
Louise vend des sous-vêtements(slips, soutiens-gorges et chaussettes) depuis très long temps. Cette activité lui permettait de construire une petite maison, de scolariser ses enfants, de les élever, c'est pourquoi, elle tient beaucoup à son développement et extension.
Sa situation la motive vivement à continuer à lutter et à avancer afin d'offrir à ses enfants une meilleur qualité de vie malgré tout.
texts.en:
Louise is conscientious, courageous and works hard.  She is divorced, her husband left her and their six children five years ago.  He was a drinker and did little to support the household so Louise believes her life is easier without him.

Louise has been selling underwear (pants, bras and socks) for many years.  Thanks to her business she has been able to build a small house, send her children to school and pay for their upkeep.  She believes it is very important to continue to expand and develop her business.  Louise is very motivated to offer her children a better quality of life despite the difficulties they face.

loans.use: to buy underwear and socks for resale.

loans.name: Karina Veronica

texts.es:
Karina tiene 28 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural dedicada a la crianza de animales y comercio que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza, cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, su negocio esta ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de cerveza para incrementar el stock de su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar sus ventas, lo que tendrá gran influencia en el negocio, con esto ella espera tener mayor stock de productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona, lo que le permitirá incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Karina is 28 years old and has a life partner and 2 children. She lives with her family in the Oyotun district in a rural area where the inhabitants make a living breeding and selling animals. The area is located in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region of northern coastal Peru. 

Karina makes a living selling beer and has more than 5 years of experience in the business. She runs her business from home. She is requesting a loan to buy a larger quantity of beer to increase the stock in her shop. This investment with help her to increase her sales which will have a big influence on her business as she will have a better variety of stock to be able to meet the diverse needs, requirements and tastes of her clients in the area. This, in turn, will help her to increase her earnings which will improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of beer to increase the stock in her shop.

loans.name: Rasoanirina

texts.fr:
Rasoanirina a 45 ans, elle est divorcée et mère de quatre enfants. Son ainé ne vie plus avec elle, et les deux derniers vont encore à l'école actuellement et le second l'aide dans l'exercice de son activité. 
Elle élève seule ses enfants, son ex-mari ne lui verse pas de pension alimentaire. Elle travaille durement pour offrir à ses enfants une meilleur qualité de vie. Elle fabrique des paniers avec des matières en plastiques qu'elle achète en rouleau. Elle demande un crédit pour acheter les matières premières. Elle voudrait augmenter les articles à vendre pour que les bénéfices augmentent ainsi.
Son désire est de devenir autonome et indépendante, elle voudrait beaucoup épargner pour l'avenir de ses enfants et d'elle-même.
texts.en:
Rasoanirina is 45 years old, divorced and has four children.  Her eldest child has left home, the two youngest are still at school and the second eldest helps Rasoanirina in her business.  Rasoanirina is responsible for providing for her children as her ex-husband pays no child support.  

She works very hard to improve the quality of life for her children.  To earn her living, she buys rolls of plastic material which she uses to make baskets.

Rasoanirina has requested this loan to buy more raw materials.  She would like to sell more baskets, increase her profits and become independent.  She would also like to build up lots of savings for the future.

loans.use: to buy plastic material to make baskets for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect drinking water because he doesn't have this service in his house and it is very difficult to carry this vital liquid in buckets for almost 1 km to his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy screwdrivers, spanners, pliers, metal brushes and padlocks for resale.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 36 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, vive en casa familiar junto sus hermanos y padres en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, los cría en una inverna cerca a su domicilio, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de 01 vaca lechera que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos con la venta de leche fresca y producción de queso fresco, con esto el espera mejorar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 36 years old and is single. He lives in his family house with his siblings and parents in the Zaña district, which is  a community of merchants, farmers and ranchers located in the Province of Chiclayo, which is part of the Lambayeqye Region on Peru's northern coast.

Juan makes a living breeding and selling small animals. He breeds them on a pasture close to his house. He is experienced in this field and has good personal and work references in the local area. 

He has requested the loan to buy 1 milking cow which will allow him to make a better income by selling fresh milk and producing fresh cheese. By doing this, he hopes to improve his income and, in turn, his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow which will help him to make a better income by selling fresh milk.

loans.name: Harilala

texts.fr:
Harilala ets une jeune femme dynamique et travailleuse. Elle a 24 ans, elle est mariée et mère de famille (un enfant de 19 mois). Elle vendait avec son mari des volailles avant 2009. Et depuis cette année elle décidait d'exercer d'autre activité pour augmenter le revenu familial. Elle effectue de l'élevage porcin (engraissement) et elle voudrait le développer davantage.
Le prêt va être utilisé pour acheter des provendes pour engraisser les porcs. Elle a déjà des clients fixes, des bouchers et ce sont eux qui viennent chez elle pour prendre les porcs au moment de la vente,  Elle n'a pas besoin de se déplacer pour faire la livraison.
Son objectif est de pouvoir bâtir un grand ferme un jour, c'est pourquoi, elle tient à développer et améliorer son petit élevage. De plus , ça lui passionne beaucoup.
texts.en:
Harilala is a young, dynamic, hard-working woman.  She is 24 years old, married and has a 19-month-old child.  

Up to 2009, she worked with her husband selling chickens.  Since then, she has increased the family's revenue by fattening up and selling pigs.  She would like to expand this business more and will use her loan to buy feed for the pigs.  Harilala has certain regular customers, such as butchers who collect the pigs when she sells them.  This means that she doesn't have to deliver them.

Harilala is passionate about her business and her aim is to build a large farm.  This is why she is working so hard to improve her current operations.

loans.use: to buy feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Maria Morena

texts.es: María de 40 años de edad quien vive en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 8 años de edad. María con el deseo de darle el mejor cuido a su hijo y aportar a su hogar desde hace 7 años se dedica a vender productos de catálogo, entre los cuales están los productos de belleza, fantasías y enchapes en joyas. María ha observado que su vivienda necesita ciertas mejoras, como el cambio de láminas del techo ya que el invierno está cerca y no desea pasar angustias por los daños que se podrían generar a causa de las lluvias, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para la compra de láminas, polines, pines y mano de obra para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Maria is 40 years old and lives in her own house alongside her life partner and their 8-year-old son. Driven by her desire to give her son the best upbringing and contribute to the household expenses, she has been selling catalogue products such as beauty products and costume jewellery for the last 7 years. 

Maria has noticed that her house needs some improvements, like changing the laminate sheets on the roof because winter is approaching and she doesn't want to worry about the damage that the rains could cause. Because of this she is requesting a loan from FUSAI so she can buy laminate sheets, beams, polin and pay for the labor to change the roof on her house.

loans.use: to buy laminate sheets, beams, polin and pay for the labor to change the roof on her house.

loans.name: Marie Antoinette

texts.fr:
Marie Antoinette est âgée de 26 ans, elle est divorcée avec deux enfants à charges. Ces derniers vont tous actuellement à l'école.
Elle est une coiffeuse-esthéticienne  de formation. Elle exploite son propre salon de beauté depuis 2008. Elle a démarré avec ses propres efforts. C'est une femme travailleuse et qui s'efforce d'économiser pour sécuriser l'avenir. Elle demande un crédit pour améliorer son salon. Elle voudrait beaucoup y investir pour attirer et fidéliser les clients.
Son objectif est de devenir autonome et indépendante, elle veut à tout prix réussir dans la vie. Elle voudrait construire sa propre maison car actuellement, elle vie avec sa mère. De plus, elle voudrait offrir une meilleur condition de vie à ses enfants.
texts.en: Marie Antoinette is 26 years old. She is divorced and has two children living under her care. Both her children are currently receiving an education. She has been trained as a hairdresser-beautician. She has been running her own beauty salon since 2008. She managed to start this business by her own efforts. She is a hard-working women who strives to save money in order to provide a stable future. She is requesting a loan in order to improve her salon. She would very much like to invest in this in order to attract and win over new customers. Her goal is to gain an independent income. She will do whatever it takes to make a success of her life. She would like to build her own home because she currently lives with her mother. She would also like to provide her children with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a hair wash basin, a hair straightener, hair clippers, a nail dryer and a hairdryer

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy traditional soap for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wax pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) and powdered soap for resale.

loans.name: Nixon Abner

texts.es: Nixon tiene 42 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposa, por lo que se siente feliz  de poderle ofrecer un lugar propio donde vivir. Nixon desde hace 15 años se dedica a prestar sus servicios como maestro, ya que desde muy joven encontró su gusto por enseñar, por lo que se siente satisfecho de contar con un trabajo que le permita ayudar a otros a superarse. Nixon desea levantar un muro de contención ya que su vivienda está junto a una zona de deslave como se observa en la fotografía y es muy peligroso que alguien se lastime, por lo que él solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, ladrillos, grava y hierro para construir un muro de contención en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Nixon is 42 years old and is a hard-working man that lives in a house on his property with his wife. He feels happy to be able to offer her a place to live. For 15 years, Nixon has made a living providing his services as a teacher, because from a young age he found his taste for teaching. He feels satisfied to count on a job that allows him to help others to improve themselves. 
Nixon wants to raise a retaining wall because his house is next to a landslide area as shown in the photograph and it is very dangerous and someone could hurt themselves. So, he is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in: cement, sand, bricks, gravel and iron to build a retaining wall on his house.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, bricks, gravel and iron to build a retaining wall on his house.

loans.name: Dúo Luchando Por Las Metas Sacatepéquez Group

texts.es: Dúo Luchando por las metas Sacatepéquez El encargado de este grupo es don Pedro quien se dedica a la cría y venta de vacas y chivos, también es albañil y cuenta con el apoyo incondicional de su esposa quien es vendedora de tomate en el mercado del pueblo. Su sueño es tener muchas vacas y convertirse en un gran ganadero. Tiene pedido de dos chivos y debe venderlos muy gorditos, el afrecho que tiene no le alcanza por eso necesita un préstamo para poder comprar afrecho y vacunas para los chivos y así vender obteniendo muy buenas ganancias sin quedarle mal a sus compradores.
texts.en: The manager of this group is Pedro who raises and sells cows and goats.  He has the unconditional support of his wife who sells tomatoes at the village market.  His dream is to have many cows and become a large cattle rancher.  He has an order for two goats which he must fatten before selling.  But he does not have enough feed and needs a loan to buy the feed and vaccines for the goats in order to satisfy his customers and earn a good profit.

loans.use: To buy cattle.

loans.name: Xiomara Elizabeth

texts.es: Xiomara tiene 27 años de edad, habita en vivienda familiar con su compañero de vida y sus 3 hijos de 4, 8 y 13 años de edad, a los cuales se dedica para sacarlos adelante con sus estudios. Ella se dedica a lavar y planchar ropa ajena por las mañanas en su comunidad, y por las tardes vende pan francés y por su amabilidad y experiencia es muy recomendada por sus vecinos y clientes como una mujer responsable y trabajadora. María desea hacer la instalación de energía  eléctrica y cambiar el techo de su vivienda, por lo que ella solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cable eléctrico, dados, caja de fusibles, toma corriente para la instalación eléctrica además de láminas y polines para el cambio del techo de la vivienda, lo quiere hacer para mejorar en lo posible la comodidad de la familia.
texts.en:
Xiomara is 27 years old and lives in her family home with her partner and their three children, ages thirteen, eight and four years old. Xiomara and her partner work hard in order to help their children move forward with their studies. In the mornings Xiomara makes a living washing and ironing clothes, and works selling bread in the afternoons. Xiomara is friendly and has experience, and is therefore said by her neighbours and customers to be responsible and hard-working.

Xiomara wants to have electricity in her home, and to replace the roof. She is therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy electric cables, a fusebox, blocks, sockets, metal sheeting and purlins. Xiomara wants to do this work to improve her family’s comfort as best as possible.

loans.use: to buy electric cables, a fusebox, blocks,sockets, metal sheeting and purlins in order to replace the roof and have electricity.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cereals for resale.

loans.name: Sixto

texts.es:
Sixto es un hombre de 57 años de edad, casado, con hijos independientes, y su negocio es la producción y venta de papa.
Él es emprendedor, dedicado, constante, paciente, optimista, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la localidad de ‘Batallas’ ubicado a 50 km de la ciudad, conocida por ser la cuna de la ‘marraqueta’ que es el pan tradicional. Los pobladores cultivan tubérculos como; papa, chuño, tunta; también elaboran quesos, leche fresca, y fabrican sus herramientas de trabajo para el campo. De clima frio y seco a 3985 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Sixto es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultural general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su esposa que se dedica al mismo. Viven en una casa propia construida de adobe con techo de calamina y piso de ladrillo, que cuenta con energía eléctrica, agua de pozo extraída mediante bomba, no tiene alcantarillado. Su negocio es la producción y venta de papa; actividad milenaria que ha sido traspasada de generación en generación y es parte fundamental de su vida y de la de su comunidad, “cuando era niño sembraba las papas de mis abuelos para comer, no existía papa para vender; actualmente la papa ‘Waycha’ y la ‘Janku’ se marchitan rápido por el exceso de agua, mientras que la ‘Imilla negra’, no necesita mucha agua. Es más fuerte para resistir la falta de agua…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes constantes, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para el tratamiento de la tierra. Su sueño es vender cosechas enteras por estación, él desea realizar el pago para el tratamiento de sus tierras para plantar papa. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 26 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Sixto solicita un préstamo para pagar el tratamiento de la tierra para sembrar papa y vender la cosecha entera.
texts.en:
Sixto, 57, is married and has independent children.  He grows and sells potatoes for a living.  He is an entrepreneur who is dedicated, consistent, patient, optimistic, responsible and very hard-working.  His farmland is in a place called "Batallas" located 50 kilometers from the city.  It is known as the birthplace of the "marraqueta" which is the traditional bread.  The villagers grow tubers such as potato, chuño, tunta; also make cheese, fresh milk, and produce farming tools.  The climate is cold and dry, and the altitude is 3,985 meters above sea level.

Sixto has a dark complexion, brown eyes, short black hair, is short in height, has a robust physique and his mother tongue is Aymara which is spoken locally.  He speaks Spanish for general purposes and because of the commerce he does.  He lives with his wife who does the same type of work.  They live in their own adobe house which has a zinc roof and brick floor.  It has electricity and well water but no sewage.

His business is producing and selling potatoes, which is a millenary activity that has been passed down through the generations and is a fundamental part of community life, "When I was a boy I would plant potatoes with my grandparents; they were for us to eat not to sell.  Now the "Waycha" and "Janku" potatoes spoil quickly because of excess water, while the "Imilla negra" does not need much water.  It is stronger and can resist a drought..." he says.  The advantage of his business is that he has a steady stream of customers.  This disadvantage is a lack of money to maintain his farmland.

His dream is to sell each season's harvest in its entirety.  In an effort to pay for treatment of his land to plant potatoes, Sixto is requesting his first loan through the institution in the 26 years he has been working in his trade.

loans.use: To treat his land to plant potatoes and sell the entire harvest.

loans.name: Joseph Hervé

texts.fr:
27 ans, marié, Joseph Hervé est un père de famille combattif et créatif. Il a un enfant. Sa vrai spécialité est la maçonnerie mais pour pouvoir offrir mieux à sa famille, il exerce une autre activité. Il s'agit de la fabrication  et livraison de donates. De plus la maçonnerie n'est pas régulier il est tâcheron.
La livraison des donates est journalière et il a déjà beaucoup de clients actuellement et il y est aidé par sa femme.
Il a démarré cette activité en 2012 avec l'appui de CEFOR et il voudrait la développer en ce moment. Il ne cesse pas de chercher et trouver d'autres clients.
C'est par le gain de cette activité qu'il a pu améliorer un peu le niveau de vie de la famille et il voudrait toujours continuer et avancer.
texts.en:
Joseph Hervé is a 27-year-old married father. He is hard-working and creative. His true speciality is masonry, but in order to better provide for his family he took up another trade, making and delivering doughnuts. His masonry work wasn't regular enough, he was merely a day-labourer.

He delivers doughnuts on a daily basis. He currently has many customers and is assisted by his wife. He started this business in 2012 with the support of CEFOR and right now he would like to further develop this venture. He is tirelessly looking for new customers. It is through this activity that he has been able to improve his family's living conditions and he would like to continue moving forward.

loans.use: to purchase three bags of flour, two bags of sugar and three dozen eggs

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, all of whom go to school. She has no additional family members. She sells green bananas at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She works six days a week. 

She has requested a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy bunches of green bananas and boxes of tomatoes, cassava, and onions. Her major challenge includes seasonality and transportation. Her goal is to buy land to start farming. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy bunches of green bananas and boxes of tomatoes, cassava, and onions.

loans.name: Dúo Superación De Villa Nueva Group

texts.es:
Dúo Superación de Villa Nueva
Doña Enma empezó su negocio con la cantidad de 300 quetzales invirtiendo En productos de consumo diario, tiene ya varios años de dedicarse a esta actividad ella socita su crédito para la venta de productos para Su tienda(consumo Diario), su mayor anhelo es poder tener más grande su tienda para salir adelante con su familia le agradese a fape y kiva por su ayuda.
texts.en:
The “Superación de Villa Nueva” duo

Enma started her business by investing 300 Quetzal in consumable products. She has a number of years’ experience in this work. Enma is applying for a loan in order to buy consumables to sell. Enma’s biggest wish is to have a larger shop in order to move forward with her family. Enma is grateful to FAPE and to Kiva for their help.

loans.use: to buy consumables to sell.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela tiene 60 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 1 hijo, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún en una zona rural donde la vida es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la crianza de animales y comercio, se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como patos, gallinas, gallos, pollos, cerdos, entre otros, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio así como alimento balanceado para su engorde, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales, con gran influencia en el negocio, ella espera incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender los diversos gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona, lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y por ende va a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Estela, 60, lives with her partner and a son in the district of Oyotun in a rural area where life is peaceful and the villagers raise animals and work as merchants.  It is located in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

She raises and sells animals such as ducks, hens, roosters, chickens, pigs and others.  She has been in business for over ten years and works from home.  She is requesting a loan to buy more animals to increase her stock, as well as balanced feed for the animals.  The investment will give her greater variety of animals and increase productivity, which will boost business.

She hopes to increase her stock and satisfy the needs of customers in the area, which will increase her income and improve her family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy more animals to increase her stock, and animal feed.

loans.name: Basirda

texts.en:
Basirda is 38 years old. She is married with four children between the ages of 2 and 10. One child goes to school. She is a farmer and she has been growing maize for the past 17 years, while her husband is a businessman. With the loan from Kiva, she would like to pay workers who harvested maize. The profits from the business will be used to pay her children's school fees and to pay for medical insurance.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain undeserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an industrial stove and raw materials such as flour, eggs, milk, meat, pepper and extracts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy young plants for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a hammer, pickaxe, shovel, cement scoop and other tools for his work.

loans.name: Dúo Villa Lobos Ll Group

texts.es: Dúo Villa Lobos ll, este Dúo esta conformado por la señora Martha de 54 años de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de refacciones, se ha dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años,en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles y seguir elaborando sus comidas que cada dia elabora para vender en un sector de su localidad,
texts.en: One of the members of this duo is Martha who is 54 years old.  She makes and sells food and has worked in the business for several years.  On this occasion she is requesting a loan to buy food products and continue her daily activity in her hometown.

loans.use: To make and sell food.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is married with six children and all go to school. She also supports additional family members. She operates a mobile money and mobile phone accessory shop and has been in this business for over 30 years. 

She has applied for a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy mobile phones, airtime, chargers, and batteries. She sells on a retail basis seven days a week. Her major business challenge is power shortages. Her goal is to see all of her children attain a good education. She has her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees, utilities, and food.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones, airtime, chargers, and batteries

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, and all go to school. She is a poultry farmer. She operates her business on a retail basis from home. She has been in business for four years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy vaccines and poultry feed. Her major business challenges include diseases that affect the quality of her chickens and changes in prices of poultry feed. Her goal is to buy more land to start growing maize. She lives in her own house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: to buy vaccines and poultry feed

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with four children, all of whom go to school. She takes care of additional family members. She operates a retail shop in a store that she rents. She has been in this business for the last eight years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy sugar, rice, soap, beans, peas, cooking oil, flour, crates of soda, and snacks. Her major challenges include seasonality and transportation. Her goal is to buy a plot of land to get a residential house. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include rent, food, and school fees.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, soap, beans, peas, cooking oil, and flour

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana inicio la venta de productos agrícolas, hace meses atrás, actividad aprendida gracias a una amiga, buscó esta actividad como una alternativa de generar dinero y como mujer pujante y emprendedora busca desesperadamente el sustento para su hogar conformado por su hijo de 5 años. 
Debido al costo de vida tan alto, Diana se ve en la necesidad de generar un mayor volumen de ingresos, es por este motivo que necesita un apoyo económico que la ayude a mejorar la cantidad de productos.
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 2 horas.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de papa, plátano, café, yuca, entre otros.

Su principal sueño es poder convertirse en la propietaria de un negocio con gran variedad de productos y sabe que está por buen camino de la mano de la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en: Diana began selling agricultural products months ago. She learned this job from a friend. She looked for this job as an alternative to get money. As a vigorous and enterprising woman, she is desperately looking for the sustenance for her home that includes her 5 year old son. Due to the high cost of living, Diana sees the necessity in getting a larger volume of income. It is for this reason that she needs the economic support that will help her to improve the quantity of the products.  She works alone every day for 2 hours. She is asking for a loan to buy potatoes, plantains, coffee, yucca and other things. Her main dream is to be able to turn into the owner of a business with a large variety of products and she knows that she is on track in the hands of the Corporación Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, plantains, coffee, yucca and other things.

loans.name: Robinah

texts.en:
Robinah is married with four children. Three of her children attend school. She also takes care of additional family members. She sells charcoal at the market and at home. She has been in this business for ten years and operates her business on both a wholesale and retail basis. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of charcoal. Her major business challenges are seasonality and transportation. Her goal is to build more rental houses. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees, utilities, and food.

loans.use: To buy bags of charcoal

loans.name: Lukiya

texts.en:
Lukiya is married with five children. She sells used clothes. She has been in this business for over ten years. She sells her clothes door to door. She works six days a week. 

She has applied for a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy bales of used clothing. She generates additional income through rental rooms. Her major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters. Her goal is to increase her sales. She resides in the family house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: To buy bales of used clothes

loans.name: Sixta Tulia

texts.es:
Gracias a la perseverancia y coraje de Sixta es que su hogar puede tener una vida digna.
Ella prepara y vende comidas en el municipio de Turbo, actividad que emprendió con el afán de buscar nuevos ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia.

Su esposo e hijos son la mayor motivación que tiene para trabajar diariamente y esforzarse para ser cada día mejor.

Trabaja sola durante 4 horas todos los días.
Ella espera poder impulsar su negocio con la compra insumos y materia prima, este impulso se lo pueden dar la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva.
Con estos elementos ella podrá tener sus alimentos disponibles para sus clientes en todo momento.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener un restaurante en la misma zona para no perder a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Thanks to her perseverance and courage, Sixta's family can have a decent life. She makes and sells food in the municipality of Turbo, an activity that she started with the objective to find new income for her family. Her husband and children are her motivation and she works hard to keep improving. She works on her own 4 hours every day. 

She expects to expand the business buying inputs and ingredients, something that Corporación Interactuar and Kiva lenders are willing to do. Thanks to this, she would be able to have the necessary food items available for her clients at any time. 

Her biggest dream is to have a restaurant in the same area, so that she can keep her current clients.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and raw materials, such as meat, chicken, rice and vegetables, among others.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children and three go to school. She has no additional family members. She operates a restaurant at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy bunches of green bananas, Irish potatoes, rice, beans, and soda. Her major challenge includes seasonality of food. Her goal is to build a residential house. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy bunches of green bananas, Irish potatoes, rice, beans, and soda

loans.name: Hanifa

texts.en:
Hanifa lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children and two of them go to school. She has no additional members in her family. She operates a hardware shop at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for over five years. She works seven days a week. 

She requested a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy bags of cement and tiles. Her major challenges include seasonality and transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a plot of land. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy bags of cement and tiles.

loans.name: Maria Gabriel

texts.es:
Maria de 50 años, vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos, desde hace 4 años tiene una tienda de abarrotes  la cual atiende en compañía de su esposo. 
Tiene como sueño ampliar su tienda donde distribuye artículos como leche, granos, verduras, lácteos y otros. 
En la actualidad tiene poco surtido y esto es perjudicial ya que no puede suplir con muchos productos que le pide su clientela. 

Maria, en vista de esto, optó en solicitar un préstamo con el fin de organizarse más y comprar al por mayor el surtido necesario como granos, azúcar, galletería, lácteos para incrementar su oferta y poder brindar mejor atención a las personas,  esto le representaría también el aumento en sus ingresos para cumplir necesidades básicas de todo negocio como son los servicios públicos, impuestos, y demás; mejorara también el bienestar de ella y el de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a 50-year old woman who lives with her partner and has 2 children. She opened her grocery store 4 years ago and works with her husband. Her dream is to expand the business, where she sells products such as milk, grains, vegetables, dairy products and others. She currently offers a limited variety and stock, which is a problem when she cannot cover her clients' demand. 

As a result, Maria has decided to apply for a loan, so that she can plan better and buy in bulk products like grains, sugar, cookies, dairy products, etc. She wants to expand her offer and to provide a better service to her clients, which would lead to an increase in revenues to cover the basic needs of every business (public services, taxes, etc.). She also expects her quality of life and that of her family to improve.

loans.use: to buy in bulk products like grains, sugar, cookies, dairy items, etc. to increase her offer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Jean Pierre

texts.fr:
Jean Pierre, un père de famille débrouillard et dynamique est de 33 ans. Il est marié et a un enfant. Il vient de perdre son deuxième enfant à cause d'une maladie grave. Et il est surtout depuis cet accident très attentif, diligent quand il est question du bien-être de sa famille.
Il dirigeait avec sa femme une petite gargote il y a maintenant déjà très long temps. Et depuis 2010, en constatant que les restes du gargote pouvaient servir à autre chose, il décidait d’effectuer de l'élevage porcin. 
Constatant l'amélioration de ce deuxième activité, il demande du crédit pour le renforcer davantage, il désire la développer et il voudrait même bâtir un ferme. Il trouve que l’élevage est plus intéressant et plus bénéfique et ça lui passionne beaucoup.
texts.en:
Jean Pierre is a self-reliant, dynamic man.  He is 33 years old, married and has one child.  His second child recently passed away due to a serious illness and Jean Pierre is now very careful about the health and well-being of his family.  

Jean Pierre and his wife have been running a small restaurant for a long time now.  In 2010, he realised that the waste food from his restaurant could be put to good use so he began raising pigs.  This business has now become quite profitable and he enjoys the work, so he would like to invest in it more.  This is why he has requested a loan, to develop his livestock business.  One day he would like to build a farm.

loans.use: to buy starter, growth and finishing feed for his livestock business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy shoes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cosmetic products for resale.

loans.name: El Pedregal Group

texts.es:
Las integrantes del grupo El Pedregal viven en una comunidad de raíces mazahuas, cuya característica es que gran parte de la población se dedica al cultivo de nopales; desde la entrada a la comunidad se pueden admirar los grandes surcos donde nace este producto. 
   Lo que define a Sara es una actitud alegre pues siempre tiene una sonrisa en el rostro, además de ser muy trabajadora. Desde hace un año vive en matrimonio con Andrés quien trabaja en la construcción de casas, juntos han formado una familia con un niño pequeño que aún no asiste a la escuela.
   Sara lleva ya diez años dedicándose a la compra y venta de artículos de fantasía como pasadores, anillos, cepillos, espejos, aretes, hilos y telas además introdujo algunos artículos de papelería. Inició con el negocio puesto que en su comunidad no había quien ofreciera estos productos y ella estableció un puesto junto a una ferretería. Gradualmente su negocio creció y logró rentar un pequeño local cerca de la carretera principal.
   Todos los días abre el negocio desde muy temprano, “realmente me va muy bien, se puede obtener buenas ganancias trabajando muy fuerte y consintiendo a los clientes” comentó. La única meta de Sara es poder crecer y vender por mayoreo y así obtener mejores ingresos para ayudar con los gastos de su hogar y mejorar su vivienda.
   Con el préstamo podrá comprar artículos de papelería como libretas, plumas, colores, gomas y sacapuntas ya que en agosto iniciará el nuevo año escolar que representa una buena época de ventas para Sara.
   Los demás integrantes del grupo El Pedregal son Verónica y Margarita quienes invertirán en su tienda de abarrotes; Eusebia y Josefina, en frutas y legumbres; Catalina, en bisutería; Maribel en antojitos mexicanos; mientras que Beatriz, lo hará en ropa.

*La fotografía fue tomada en la tienda de Verónica, Sara tiene en brazos a su bebé*
texts.en:
The members of the El Pedregal group live in a community with Mazahua roots. It is characterized by the fact that a big part of its population grows nopal cactuses. From the moment you enter  the community you can admire the big rows of these plants growing. 

What defines Sara is her attitude. She always has a smile on her face. She is also very hardworking. For a year, she has been married to Andrés, who works in home construction. Together they have started a family with a little boy who is not in school yet. 

Sara has been buying and selling fantasy items such as pins, rings, brushes, mirrors, earrings, threads and fabrics. She has also started selling some school supplies. She started her business because in her community there was no one who offered these products and she opened up a little stall next to a hardware store. Gradually, her business grew and she was able to rent a small locale close to the main road.

She opens her business every day very early.  “It's really going well for me. You can earn good profits by working hard and making the customers happy", she remarked. Sara's only goal is to be able to grow and sell wholesale and thus obtain income to help with the household expenses and improve her home. 

With the loan, she will be able to buy school supplies such as notebooks, pens, crayons, and erasers. The new school year will start in August and that is a good sales season for Sara.

The rest of the members of the El Pedregal group are Verónica and Margarita, who will invest  in their general store; Eusebia and Josefina, in fruits and vegetables; Catalina, in jewelry; Maribel in Mexican traditional foods; and Beatriz will invest in clothing. 

*The photograph was taken in Verónica's store. Sara is holding her baby in her arms.*

loans.use: to buy school supplies products such as pencil sharpeners, erasers, pencils, notebooks, etc., as well as gifts.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
Sabina gracias a los créditos a los que ha tenido acceso a logrado superarse porque su cultivo ahora ha mejorado y sus ingresos también, ella cuenta que confía mucho en ADICLA  porque lo atienden con amabilidad y respeto,  es por eso que nuevamente solicita un préstamo para poder comprar insecticidas, fungicidas y semillas  de papa para cultivar en esta temporada.
Sabina espera contar nuevamente con su apoyo y seguir prosperando para instalar un tienda de artesanías.
texts.en:
Sabina has been able to get ahead thanks to the loans she has received, because her plantations and her income have improved. She says that she trusts ADICLA a lot because she is treated kindly and with respect. This is why she is requesting a loan again to be able to buy insecticides, fungicides, and potato seeds to grow this season.

Sabina hopes to have your support again and be able to continue prospering in order to open a handicrafts store.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, fungicides and seeds.

loans.name: Keren Berenice

texts.es:
Keren, es madre soltera de tres hijos, vive en casa de su familia; ella trabaja en la venta de productos de belleza y medicinas naturales, el negocio lo atiende sola en su tiempo libre, también es empleada, poco a poco ha ido aumentando sus clientes y la variedad de productos que ofrece.
Invertirá en cosméticos, accesorios de enchape, prendas de vestir y medicinas, incorporara nuevos productos en su inventario con el propósito de atender mejor a sus clientes actuales y atraer a nuevos, espera que las ventas aumenten y que sus ganancias sean estables.
Sus sueños son salir adelante con su familia, cancelar el crédito, aumentar la capacidad de su negocio y llegar a tener más clientes.
texts.en:
Keren is the single mother of three children. She lives with her family. She works selling beauty products and natural medicines. She runs her business by herself in her free time. She also has a job. Little by little, she has increased her customers and the variety of products that she offers.

She will invest in cosmetics, jewelry, clothing and medicines. She will incorporate new products into her inventory with the purpose of better serving her present customers and attracting new ones. She hopes that her sales will increase and that her profits will be stable. Her dream is to get ahead with her family, pay off the loan, increase her business' capacity and have more customers.

loans.use: to invest in cosmetics, jewelry, clothing, and medicines. She will incorporate new products into her inventory in order to better serve her customers.

loans.name: Los Comerciantes De Andahuaylillas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS COMERCIANTES DE ANDAHUAYLLILAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Valentina ella es conviviente y tiene 40 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de ganaderia, la socia los hace engordar y crecer a los ganados y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia es una mujer trabajadora y luchadora que por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia por medio de este trabajo quiere salir adelante, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de ganados. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar alimentos para los ganados.

La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo despues la foto porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de chicha, negocio de crianza de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These borrowers belong to the “LOS COMERCIANTES DE ANDAHUAYLLILAS” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas, province of Quispicanchis and department of Cuzco.

The borrower is Valentina. She is in a common law marriage and is 40 years old. She has 3 children. She works in the cattle business. She fattens the cattle and sells them in different markets. She works from 8:00 a.m until 6:00 p.m. She is a hardworking woman who is a fighter. Through this business, she gets her children ahead. She wants to get ahead with this business and her dream is to expand the cattle sales. She is asking for the loan to buy feed for the cattle.  

She is added on to the group photo because her photo was taken later because she was absent due to work. 

The other member work selling chicha, raising animals, running a general store and selling food. 

This borrower is grateful to those who are a part of her dream in this way and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy feed for cattle.

loans.name: G.s Mujeres Preciosas Group

texts.es:
La señora Rubenia es una mujer muy trabajadora y dedicada al su negocio, el cual es la venta de abarrotería en general, su negocio lo realiza desde hace mas de 24 años y lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación.
Doña Rubenia esta se encuentra en un punto estratégico frente a una escuela y en la calle principal donde en tránsito de personas a diario es alto, también cuenta con un pequeño molino de maíz y se levanta muy temprano atender a sus clientes.
Doña Rubenia solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos como ser azúcar, manteca jabón, arroz, pollo, huevos, café, frijoles, etc. espera que esta inversión le permita obtener los ingresos necesarios para salir adelante con su familia, sueña con tener un negocio más grande y mejor surtido de la zona, solicita el apoyo del credito de manera grupal con las siguientes personas.
Doña Celina se dedica a la venta de abarrotería en general hace más de 24 años.
Doña Lilian se dedica a la venta de ropa usada hace más de 3 años.
Doña María se dedica a la venta de abarrotería en general desde hace 30 años.
Y la señora Eva se dedica a la venta de golosinas como ser nacatamales, tajaditas y los fines de semana vende ropa usada. 
Danli,  Honduras -  Mayo del  2015
texts.en:
Rubenia is a hardworking woman, dedicated to her business, which is a grocery store. She has had it for more than twenty-four years, at home.

Rubenia is strategically located in front of a school on the main street, which is highly transited. She also has a small corn mill and wakes up very early to serve her customers.

Rubenia is requesting a loan to buy products such as sugar, butter, soap, rice, chicken, eggs, coffee, and beans. She hopes that this investment helps her to receive the income she needs to get ahead with her family. Her dream is to have the largest and better-stocked business in the area.

Rubenia is requesting a loan group together with the following people:

Celina has been selling groceries for more than twenty-four years.
Lilian has been selling used clothes for more than three years.
María has been selling groceries for thirty years.
And Eva sells snacks such as nacatamales and fries, and used clothes during the weekends.

Danli, Honduras – May 2015.

loans.use: to buy products such as sugar, butter, soap, rice, chicken, eggs, coffee, and beans.

loans.name: Patron San Jeronimo Ii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “PATRON SAN JERONIMO II”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elizabeth ella es soltera y tiene 50 años y tiene 5 hijos; La socia trabaja en su  negocio de venta de comida, la socia realiza un platos como salchipapas que es un plato a base de papa y salchichas,al socia es una mujer trabajadora y luchadora que por medio de este pequeño negocio saca adelante a su familia,ella vende en una carreta en forma ambulatoria, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como papas y salchichas.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de internet, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members are part of the communal bank Patron San Jeronimo II. It is located in the district of Cusco, which is part of the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member Elizabeth is single, 50 years old and has five children. She works in her business of selling food. She prepares meals like salchipapas, a dish, which is basically made from potatoes and sausages. She is very diligent and hard-working, and through her small business she is improving her family's financial situation. She is selling from a cart and by walking around. She works from 8 in the morning until 6 at night. She has been doing this work for eight years and it is going well. Her dream is to have a restaurant.

She is requesting this loan to buy cooking ingredients, such as potatoes and sausages.

The other members earn a living with online business, selling clothing, grocery stores, and restaurants.

The member thanks those who are part of realizing her dream through this medium and she is committed to pay her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients, such as potatoes and sausages.

loans.name: Adelfa

texts.en:
Adelfa earns a living offering printing, photocopying and lamination services. She is married and lives in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. 

Adelpha is now well-known for her good quality printing and photocopying services, and she earns a good profit each month dealing in this kind of business. 

To generate more income, she is seeking a PHP 50,000 loan to buy additional photocopier and printer machine units, in order to provide a quick and efficient service and to be able to serve more customers. 

In her previous loans she never had a delinquency. Adelfa is very diligent and loves accuracy, which only adds to the effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to buy additional photocopier and printer machine units, in order to provide a quick and efficient service and to be able to serve more customers.

loans.name: Ursula

texts.en:
Ursula comes from the town of Balilihan, Bohol. She is a 64-year-old married woman with six grown-up children.  

Ursula makes and sells native baskets, and she has been engaged in weaving baskets for more than 10 years now. However, she needs additional capital in order to purchase materials for her on-going business.

She is asking for a loan to purchase additional materials like wicker (pliable twigs), nito (palm) and bamboo strips. This will boost her livelihood and enable her to produce more baskets to sell. Thus, slowly, her earnings will improve and she will be able to handle her finances. She could then afford to buy nutritious meals that are essential in her day-to-day working activity. 

She hopes and is determined to handle her current source of income successfully and to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like wicker (pliable twigs), nito (palm) and bamboo strips

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is a 28-year-old married woman with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Helen has a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her sari-sari store. She has been in this business for two years. 

In the future, Helen would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.es:
Herminia de 54 años de edad, estudió hasta 2° grado, actualmente está casada y tiene 6 hijos pero solo 4 dependen de ella y su esposo trabaja la agricultura.

Herminia se dedica a los oficios domésticos desde hace 40 años, actividad que aprendió de su madre, además se dedica al cuidado de aves de corral la cual le genera otra fuente de ingresos.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes,  2 sacos de fórmula, 2 sacos de sulfato y 2 galones de herbicidas.

Su sueño es tener mejores cosechas de la producción de los granos básicos como maíz y maicillo y de las ganancias planea comprar cerdos.
texts.en:
Herminia, 54 years old, went to school up to the 2nd grade, currently is married and has 6 children, but only 4 depend on her, and her husband works in agriculture. 

Herminia has taken care of the household tasks for the past 40 years, work that she learned from her mother. In addition, she works taking care of poultry, which makes another source of income for her. 

She needs the loan to purchase fertilizer, 2 sacks of formula, 2 sacks of sulfate, and 2 gallons of herbicide.

Her dream is to have better harvests of basic grains such as corn and sorghum, and with the earnings she plans to purchase pigs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, 2 sacks of formula, 2 sacks of sulfate, and 2 gallons of herbicide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to get to the place where he works.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es: La señora Dionicia de estado civil soltera alcanzó a estudiar la primaria, vive en el área rural en una casa de adobe que carece de servicios básicos, es una persona trabajadora y con mucho optimismo trabaja día a día para obtener ingresos económicos. Se dedica primordialmente a la agricultura, en esta actividad ya lleva 14 años, donde produce y comercializa sus productos. Tiene cuatro hijos los cuales actualmente estudian en la escuela de su comunidad, ella trabaja para sustentar la  educación, alimentación y desarrollo de ellos. Los productos que obtiene los lleva a la venta en ferias provinciales de la región y pueblos aledaños, los productos principales que siembra son papa, haba, zanahoria y otros en menor cantidad generalmente para consumo propio. La señora necesita de ayuda económica para la compra de insumos como semilla de papa, de esta manera continuará con su producción e incrementará sus ingresos para ofrecerle mejorar calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Dionicia is single, and she managed to complete primary school. She lives in a rural area in an adobe house which lacks basic services. She is a hard-working person and, with a lot of optimism, she works each day to get income. She works primarily in agriculture. She has already been doing this work for 14 years, where she produces and sells her products. She has four children who are currently students in the community school. She works to support their education, nutrition and development. The products that she gets she brings to sell at the provincial fairs in the region and the nearby towns. The principal products that she plants are potatoes, broad beans, carrots and others in small quantities generally for their own consumption.  This lady needs the loan to purchase supplies such as potato seeds; in this way she will continue with her production and will increase her income to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as potato seeds; in this way she will continue with her production and will increase her income to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a hardworking female entrepreneur with five children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her sari-sari store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. 

Jocelyn dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 53-year-old married woman with six children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Susana has a fruit and vegetable vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 40,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall. She has been in this business for 16 years. 

In the future, Susana would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente de 73 años de edad, estudió hasta 2° grado, no continuó sus estudios por la distancia en que estaban las escuelas, actualmente está casado y tiene dos hijos que ya son independientes.

Vicente trabaja en la agricultura, actividad que aprendió desde pequeño por su padre y porque también le gustaba dicho trabajo.

Él necesita este crédito para comprar fórmula, sulfato, herbicidas, etc. Para aplicar a sus cultivos.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando en la agricultura y que no le falte nada a su esposa.
texts.en:
Vicente, 73 years old, went to school up to the 2nd grade. He couldn't continue his studies due to the distance to the schools. Currently he is married and he has two children who are now independent. 

Vicente works in agriculture, work that he learned from his father when he was young and also because he liked this work. 

He needs this loan to purchase formula, sulfate, herbicides, etc. to apply to his crops. 

His dream is to continue working in agriculture and that his wife doesn't want for anything.

loans.use: to purchase formula, sulfate, herbicides, etc. to apply to his crops.

loans.name: Keila Evelin

texts.es:
Keila, de 26 años de edad, es una joven emprendedora, estudio hasta bachillerato, luego se graduó de un curso de cosmetología, actualmente posee un negocio de venta de ropa, vive junto a su madre y una hermana. 

Keila, tiene dos años de experiencia en el negocio de la venta de ropa, decidió dedicarse al negocio por iniciativa propia, ya que la idea principal que ella tenía era poner una sala de belleza, pero el capital no le alcanzaba y decidió empezar a vender ropa, el negocio ha venido creciendo poco a poco; ella se traslada todos los días de su casa al trabajo a las 7 de la mañana, ya que su negocio está a 10 kilómetros de distancia desde su casa y retorna a las 4 de la tarde.  

El préstamo que Keila, está solicitando es para comprar ropa para el negocio y para pagar un nuevo local más amplio que le están arrendando en el mercado municipal.  

Los sueños Keila, son comenzar a arreglar el nuevo local que le alquilaran, además sueña con poner su sala de belleza que es su objetivo principal y ampliar más el negocio de ropa que tiene, además desea casarse y formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
Keila, 26 years old, is an enterprising young woman. She completed secondary school, and after graduating, she took a course in cosmetology. She currently has a business selling clothing. She lives with her mother and a sister.
